name: Uzumaki Naruto
description: A Genin from Team 8, Naruto is an orphan with the goal to one day become Hokage. Using his signature move, Shadow Clones, Naruto is able to perform powerful moves such as the Uzumaki Naruto Combo and the Rasengan.

skills.name: Uzumaki Naruto Combo
skills.description: Naruto's version of the Lion Combo. This skill deals 20 damage to one enemy. During 'Shadow Clones' this skill will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Rasengan
skills.description: Naruto hits one enemy with a ball of chakra dealing 45 damage to them and stunning their skills for 1 turn. This skill requires 'Shadow Clones'.

skills.name: Shadow Clones
skills.description: Naruto creates multiple shadow clones hiding his true self. Naruto gains 15 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. During this time 'Uzumaki Naruto Combo' will deal 10 additional damage and 'Rasengan' can be used.

skills.name: Sexy Technique
skills.description: This skill makes invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Haruno Sakura
description: A Genin from Team 7, Sakura is very intelligent, but self-conscious about herself. Having just recently received training from Tsunade, Sakura is now able to deliver powerful punches and heal her own allies.

skills.name: KO Punch
skills.description: Sakura punches one enemy with all her strength dealing 20 damage to them and stunning their physical or mental skills for 1 turn. During 'Inner Sakura', KO Punch deals 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Mystical Palm Healing
skills.description: Using basic healing techniques Sakura heals herself or one ally for 25 health.

skills.name: Inner Sakura
skills.description: Sakura's inner self surfaces and urges her on. For 4 turns, Sakura will gain 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore all stuns. During this time 'KO Punch' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Sakura Replacement Technique
skills.description: This skill makes invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Sasuke
description: A Genin from Team 7, Sasuke is the lone survivor of the Uchiha clan and has sworn vengeance against his brother. Using his sharingan, Sasuke is able to anticipate incoming attacks and is capable of advanced offensive moves.

skills.name: Lion Combo
skills.description: Copying a taijutsu combo that Lee used on him, Sasuke deals 30 damage to one enemy. This skill will deal an additional 15 damage to an enemy affected by 'Sharingan'.

skills.name: Chidori
skills.description: Using a lightning element attack jutsu, Sasuke deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill will deal an additional 25 damage to an enemy affected by 'Sharingan'.

skills.name: Sharingan
skills.description: Sasuke targets one enemy. For 4 turns, Sasuke will gain 15 points of damage reduction. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.* This will end if Sasuke dies.

skills.name: Swift Block
skills.description: This skill makes invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Inuzuku Kiba
description: A Genin from Team 8, Kiba is a member of the Inuzuka clan, and is both short-tempered and impulsive. Using his dog, Akamaru, Kiba is capable of powerful taijutsu or fusing with Akamaru to become a deadly double headed dog.

skills.name: Garouga
skills.description: This skill does 30 damage to one enemy. During 'Double-Headed Wolf' this skill is improved and costs 1 less random chakra.

skills.name: Double-Headed Wolf
skills.description: Kiba and Akamaru turn into giant beasts attacking all enemies dealing 15 damage each turn for 3 turns. The following 3 turns 'Garouga' is improved and costs 1 less random chakra.* During this time Kiba gains 15 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Dynamic Marking
skills.description: Akamaru sprays urine on one enemy who cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable for 3 turns. During this time, 'Double-Headed Wolf' and 'Garouga' will deal 5 additional damage to them. Dynamic Marking cannot be used on an enemy already being affected.

skills.name: Smoke Bomb
skills.description: This skill makes Inuzuku Kiba invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Aburame Shino
description: A Genin from Team 8, Shino is the successor of the Aburame clan, and a very reserved and tactical fighter. Using the bugs that live inside his body, Shino is able to leech the chakra off his enemies, or protect his entire team.

skills.name: Chakra Leech
skills.description: Shino directs his chakra draining bugs to attack one enemy dealing 20 affliction damage and steals 1 random chakra.

skills.name: Female Bug
skills.description: Shino directs one of his female bugs to attach itself to one enemy. For 4 turns, new non-affliction damage that enemy deals is reduced by 5 points. During this time, 'Chakra Leech' will deal 5 additional damage to them. These effects stack.

skills.name: Bug Wall
skills.description: Shino sends millions of bugs to create a wall around his team, making them gain 20 points of destructible defense.

skills.name: Shino Hide
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Shino invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Hinata
description: A Genin from Team 8, Hinata is the next in line in the Hyuuga clan, but she is shy and very withdrawn. Using the trademark Byakugan of the Hyuuga, Hinata is able to delicately target an enemy's Chakra Points while defending the team.

skills.name: Hinata Gentle Fist
skills.description: Using the Hyuuga clan's style of taijutsu Hinata does 15 damage to one enemy. During 'Byakugan' this skill will also remove 1 random Chakra and will cost 1 Taijutsu Chakra and deals 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Protective Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms
skills.description: For 1 turn, Hinata deals 15 damage to all enemies and all allies including her will gain 5 destructible defense. During 'Byakugan' this skill will deal 5 additional damage and grants 5 permanently destructible defense.

skills.name: Byakugan
skills.description: Hinata activates her Byakugan gaining 10 points of damage reduction for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, 'Hinata Gentle Fist' and 'Protective Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms' will be improved.

skills.name: Hinata Block
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hinata invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nara Shikamaru
description: A Genin from Team 10, a member of the Nara clan, Shikamaru is considered to be the smartest Genin of all the Konoha 11. Using his bloodline, Shikamaru can manipulate the shadows in the battlefield to disable and attack his enemies.

skills.name: Meditate
skills.description: Shikamaru sits down and begins thinking up a strategy against one enemy for 5 turns. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and cannot used on an enemy already affected by it.

skills.name: Shadow-Neck Bind
skills.description: Shikamaru chokes all enemies, dealing 15 damage to them and making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. If an enemy is affected by 'Meditate', this skill will last 2 turns instead.

skills.name: Shadow Imitation
skills.description: Shikamaru captures all enemies in shadows, stunning their non-mental skills for 1 turn. Enemies affected by 'Meditate' will instead have their non-mental skills stunned for 2 turns.

skills.name: Shikamaru Hide
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Shikamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Akimichi Chouji
description: Chouji Akimichi is a member of Konohagakure's Akimichi Clan and a member of Team 10. Though sensitive about his weight, Chōji is nevertheless dedicated to his friends.

skills.name: Partial Multi-Size
skills.description: Chouji doubles the size of his arms and attacks one enemy dealing 20 damage.

skills.name: Meat Tank
skills.description: Chouji transforms into a Meat Tank dealing 10 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. Chouji is invulnerable for 2 turns.

skills.name: Akimichi Pills
skills.description: Chouji eats a pill improving his skills, 'Partial Multi-Size' will deal 20 additional damage and 'Meat Tank' will deal 10 additional damage per turn. Chouji takes 20 affliction damage. Chouji can only eat three pills and this skill is permanent.

skills.name: Effortless Block
skills.description: This skill makes Akimichi Chouji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yamanaka Ino
description: A genin from Team 10, Ino is as confident as she is vain. She projects the strength of her will directly into the minds of her opponents, bypassing their physical defenses and rendering them helpless.

skills.name: Mind Body Disturbance
skills.description: Using this skill Ino stuns the non-mental skills of one enemy for 1 turn and does 30 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability to one random enemy. During this time the target is unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.

skills.name: Mind Body Switch
skills.description: Ino takes over the mind of an enemy. For 4 turns one enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable. During this time, Ino only can target this enemy and their skills are stunned. During this time This skill will be replaced by 'Art of the Valentine'.

skills.name: Chakra Hair Strand Trap
skills.description: Ino uses a strand of chakra endowed hair to create a trap. For 1 turn, if one enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will have the cooldowns of their skills increased by 1 for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Ino Block
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Ino invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Art of the Valentine
skills.description: This skill does 25 damage to one enemy.

name: Rock Lee
description: A member of team Gai; Lee is a genin with no talent at all in ninjutsu or genjutsu, so he has focused his life all on taijutsu. With his powerful hand to hand techniques, Lee can crush any defense with his immense power.

skills.name: High Speed Taijutsu
skills.description: Lee deals 10 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, Lee will gain 5 points of damage reduction and that enemy will receive an additional 10 damage from 'Front Lotus'.* This skill stacks and will deal 10 additional damage during 'Fifth Gate Opening'.

skills.name: Front Lotus
skills.description: Opening the first gate, Lee uses a high powered taijutsu to destroy enemy destructible defense and deal 30 damage to one enemy. This skill will deal 15 additional damage during 'Fifth Gate Opening'.

skills.name: Fifth Gate Opening
skills.description: Lee removes all harmful effects on him, and for 2 turns, Lee will be invulnerable to all Physical and Chakra skills and this skill will be replaced by 'Final Lotus'. When he uses a new skill, he will receive 10 damage.* Lee cannot die from this skill.

skills.name: Lee Block
skills.description: This skill makes Rock Lee invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Final Lotus
skills.description: Lee uses his strongets ability, expending all his chakra and dealing 70 damage to one enemy. Afterwards, 'Fifth Gate Opening' will end.

name: Tenten
description: A member of Team Guy, Tenten is a fiercely independent weapon specialist who intends to become a legendary kunoichi. She keeps an entire arsenal sealed in scrolls to rain down upon the battlefield, wounding and disabling her opponents.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons
skills.description: Tenten deals 20 damage to one enemy, and 10 to all other enemies. All enemies will receive 10 additional damage from 'Twin Rising Dragons Trap' and will have their physical and chakra damage lowered by an additional 10 from it. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons Trap
skills.description: Tenten deals 5 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, their physical and chakra damage will be lowered by 5. All stacks of 'Twin Rising Dragons' will be removed from all targets afterwards. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Twin Rising Dragons Full Release
skills.description: Tenten becomes invulnerable to all non-mental skills for 1 turn and improves her skills until the next time she uses one of them; this does not stack. 'Twin Rising Dragons' will apply its non-damage effect twice and the damage reduction effect of 'Twin Rising Dragons Trap' will last an additional turn.

skills.name: Spiked Boulder Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Tenten invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Neji
description: A member of team Guy, Neji is the cold and fatalistic prodigy of the Hyūga clan. He has mastered numerous techniques, from crippling blows to whirling invulnerability.

skills.name: Neji Gentle Fist
skills.description: Using the Hyuuga clan's special form of taijutsu, Neji deals 25 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. During this time, that enemy will deal 5 less damage with any non-affliction skill.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Revolving Heaven
skills.description: Neji becomes invulnerable for 1 turn while dealing 15 damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Eight Trigram Sixty-Four Palms
skills.description: Neji closes all of one enemy's chakra nodes dealing 40 damage to one enemy and that enemy loses 1 random chakra.

skills.name: Byakugan Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Neji invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Gaara
description: Gaara has the demon Shukaku within him, which enables him to use sand for fighting. This sand can either form an ultimate defence or kill an opponent instantly.

skills.name: Automatic Sand Defense
skills.description: If one enemy uses a new first harmful skill on Gaara or he ally they will be countered and they will take 15 piercing damage and the countered enemy will have 'Sand Trail' applied on him. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sand Formation
skills.description: Gaara gains 20 points of destructible defense for 3 turns. This skill will be replaced by 'Sand Shuriken' for 2 Turns. While Destructible Defense is active, the enemy that use a new harmful skill on gaara will have 'Sand Trail' Applied on them.

skills.name: Sand Coffin
skills.description: Gaara traps an enemy in a sand coffin for 1 turn and deals 40 damage and stuns their Physical and Mental skills. If gaara is receive a new harmful skill during this skill the enemy will have 'Sand Trail' Applied on them.

skills.name: Shield of Sand
skills.description: This skill makes this character invulnerable for 1 turn.  During this time, if any enemy use a harmful skill on Gaara during this time will have 'Sand Trail' Applied on them.

skills.name: Sand Shuriken
skills.description: This skill does 10 damage to all enemies and apply 'Sand Trail' on them.

skills.name: Sand Trail
skills.description: Trail of sand that makes the affected enemy receive 5 more damage from Gaara’s skills. This skill stacks.

name: Kankuro
description: Kankuro is a master puppeteer, and uses only puppets for fighting. His puppets can deal damage as well as poison enemies.

skills.name: Black Secret Machine One Shot
skills.description: Kankuro uses two of his puppets to trap and stab one enemy who takes 30 piercing damage.

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.description: One of Kankuro's puppets creates a cloud of smoke that does 10 affliction damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Puppet Preparation
skills.description: Kankuro always enters fights prepared, constantly using his puppets as decoys and gaining 15 permanent destructible defense. For 4 turns, 'Black Secret Machine One Shot' and 'Poison Bomb' deals 5 additional damage. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Puppet Replacement Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Kankuro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Temari
description: Temari is the elder sister of Gaara and Kankuro. She uses a giant fan as her main weapon to do powerful long ranged attacks.

skills.name: Cutting Whirlwind
skills.description: Temari creates a razor sharp wind with her fan that hits one enemy for 20 damage. The following turn, Temari will become invulnerable to all harmful non-mental skills.

skills.name: Summoning Quick Beheading Dance
skills.description: Temari creates a much more massive version of Cutting Whirlwind by summoning the wind weasel Kamatari which deals 35 damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Dust Wind
skills.description: Temari kicks up dust with her fan, making all her allies invulnerable for 1 turn. For 2 turns, all enemies will deal 15 less non-affliction damage.*

skills.name: Backflip
skills.description: This skill makes Temari invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kinuta Dosu
description: One of the three sound genin, Dosu is patient and logical. His sound-projecting gauntlet shatters his opponents' hearing, making them more vulnerable to attacks.

skills.name: Resonating Echo Drill
skills.description: Dosu attacks with his drill, dealing 20 damage to one enemy, and that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Sound Manipulation' will deal 10 additional damage to that enemy.

skills.name: Sound Manipulation
skills.description: Kinuta Dosu deals 10 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, this enemy will take 5 additional damage from non-affliction skills and will deal 5 less damage from non-affliction skills. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Melody Arm Tuning
skills.description: Dosu fine-tunes his Melody Arm to produce debilitating sound vibrations. The following 3 turns, 'Resonating Echo Drill' will deal 20 additional damage and 'Sound Manipulation' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Dosu Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Kinuta Dosu invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tsuchi Kin
description: One of the three sound genin, Kin likes to defeat her enemies slowly and painfully, torturing them with her needles and bells. Her moves empower each other when strung together in disorienting harmony.

skills.name: Illusion Bell Needles
skills.description: One enemy receives 15 damage. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Unnerving Bells' that enemy will receive 25 additional damage. If used one turn after 'Needle and Bell Trap' Kin will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Needle and Bell Trap
skills.description: One enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable for 2 turns. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Unnerving Bells' that enemy will also be stunned for one turn. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Illusion Bell Needles' that enemy will also receive 10 damage.

skills.name: Unnerving Bells
skills.description: One enemy loses 1 chakra. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Needle and Bell Trap' that enemy will also take 15 more damage from physical damage for 1 turn. If used on an enemy one turn after 'Illusion Bell Needles' that enemy will also take 15 more damage from chakra damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sharp Analysis
skills.description: This skill makes Tsuchi Kin invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Abumi Zaku
description: Zaku Abumi is one of the three sound genin sent to the chuunin exams. He was surgically altered with hollow tubes in his arms, allowing him to create waves of compressed air.

skills.name: Decapitating Airwaves
skills.description: Using his surgically altered arms Zaku fires a blast of supersonic air at one enemy who takes 25 damage. 'Extreme Decapitating Airwaves' may be used the following turn.

skills.name: Wall of Air
skills.description: Zaku alters his air wave to protect one ally for 1 turn. The first harmful non-mental skill used on this ally is countered. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Extreme Decapitating Airwaves
skills.description: Zaku boosts his air waves to a frightening level and does 45 damage to all enemies. This skill requires 'Decapitating Airwaves' to be used in the previous turn.

skills.name: Airwave Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Zaku Abumi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Young Kakashi
description: A jounin at the age of 13 and the son of the legendary White Fang, Kakashi is a member of Team Minato. Using his early ninjutsu, and borrowed sharingan, Kakashi can fight any adult on an equal level.

skills.name: White Fang Slash
skills.description: Using his sword, Young Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Young Kakashi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

skills.name: Amateur Raikiri
skills.description: Using a weaker form of his signature jutsu, Young Kakashi deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn, that enemy will deal 5 less non-affliction damage. The following turn, Young Kakashi will deal 5 additional damage with his skills.

skills.name: Implanted Sharingan
skills.description: For 1 turn, if one enemy uses a skill that removes or steals chakra, Kakashi will gain 1 random chakra, if they use a skill that stuns, Kakashi's skills will stun for 1 turn and if they use a skill that damages, Kakashi's skills will deal an additional 10 damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sword Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Young Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Obito
description: A minor member of the Uchiha clan and a chuunin, Obito is a member of Team Minato. He is regarded as an under achieving daydreamer, but within him lies hidden strength.

skills.name: Piercing Stab
skills.description: Finding an opening in his enemy's defense, Obito quickly stabs them dealing 15 piercing damage to the enemy. During 'Obito Sharingan' this skill will deal an additional 10 damage and will ignore invulnerability.

skills.name: Obito Great Fireball
skills.description: Obito breaths searing fire on one enemy dealing 15 affliction damage to them for 2 turns. During 'Obito Sharingan', this skill will deal an instant 30 affliction damage and have no cooldown.

skills.name: Obito Sharingan
skills.description: Obito targets one ally. For 4 turns, Obito will gain 15 points of damage reduction. If Obito dies, that ally will gain 5 points of damage reduction and will deal 5 additional non-affliction damage permanently. During this time this skill becomes 'Sharingan Parry'.

skills.name: Obito Flee
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Obito invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sharingan Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Obito allies invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nohara Rin
description: A chuunin medical nin assigned to Team Minato, Rin is a quiet and passive girl who focuses on keeping her team mates alive.

skills.name: Pit Trap
skills.description: Rin traps one enemy. For 1 turn, Rin will gain 15 points of damage reduction, and that enemy will take 15 piercing damage at the end of their turn. If that enemy uses a new skill they will take another 15 piercing damage. The target of this skill is invisible.

skills.name: Rin Mystical Palm Healing
skills.description: Rin heals a team mate or herself 25 health and removes all harmful afflictions on that ally.

skills.name: Medical Kit
skills.description: Rin gives her medical kit to herself or an ally. For 3 turns, that character will heal 10 health. During this time, any healing skills used by that character will be increased by 10 points.

skills.name: Flee
skills.description: This skill makes Nohara Rin invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Hanabi
description: The younger sister of Hinata, Hanabi is a Hyuuga clan member from the main branch family who trains endlessly to prove her worth. While young, Hanabi's skills surpass her elder sister's, and although unable to utilize her byakugan yet and lacking in physical strength, Hanabi makes up for it with her tenacity and speed.

skills.name: Hanabi Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hanabi deals 15 damage to one enemy for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, each time that enemy uses a chakra removal, drain or gain skill, they will lose 1 random chakra.

skills.name: Hanabi Kaiten
skills.description: Hanabi performs a spinning kick at one enemy, dealing 15 damage to them for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, each time that enemy uses a skill that stuns, they will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Unyielding Tenacity
skills.description: Hanabi fights to the bitter end. For 2 turns, Hanabi will be unable to be killed and will ignore all stun effects. During this time 'Hanabi Gentle Fist' and 'Hanabi Kaiten' will cost 1 random and Hanabi will deal 5 more damage.

skills.name: Hanabi Byakugan
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hanabi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Drunken Lee
description: Having accidentally drank sake, Lee's hidden Drunken Fist powers have awakened, completely changing his fighting style. While drunk, Lee attacks randomly, but is harder to stop the more he keeps fighting.

skills.name: Unpredictable Assault
skills.description: Using his drunken master abilities, Lee punches one random enemy, dealing 20 damage to them. This skill can't be countered. Each time this skill is used, it will deal 5 more damage.

skills.name: Drunken Counter
skills.description: Lee targets himself or his ally. For 1 turn, the first new harmful physical skill used on the target will be countered and the countered enemy will have 'Unpredictable Assault' used on them.

skills.name: Drunken Fist
skills.description: Lee gets in his Drunken Fist stance. For 3 turns, one enemy will receive 15 damage. The following 3 turns, Lee will ignore all harmful effects except damage and chakra cost changes used on him, and 'Unpredictable Assault' will become targetable while dealing 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Drunken Leap
skills.description: This skill makes Drunken Lee invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Rehabilitated Gaara
description: After his fateful encounter with Naruto, Gaara has left behind his murderous ways, and has instead rehabilitated. Gaara has honed his abilities to shape and craft his sand, allowing him to create giant waves of sand or quicksand traps.

skills.name: Sand Mastery
skills.description: Gaara Target himself for 3 turns. During this time his skills will deal 5 additional damage and gains 15 points of destructible defense. During this time, this skill becomes 'Desert imperial Funeral

skills.name: Prison Sand Burial
skills.description: Gaara traps the enemy team team in a sinking pit of sand, increasing the cost of all their non-mental skills by one random for 1 turn, and deals 5 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Quicksand Waterfall Flow
skills.description: Gaara deals 10 damage to the enemy team for 2 turns. During this time all destructible defense skills Gaara's team uses will grant 5 more destructible defense.

skills.name: Shield of Shukaku
skills.description: This skill makes Rehabilitated Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Desert imperial Funeral
skills.description: Gaara deals 25 piercing damage. If that enemy is affected by 'Quicksand waterfall flow' they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn

name: Oboro
description: A Rain Genin in the Chuunin exams, Oboro is vindictive ninja that specializes in genjutsu. Using the various illusions that Oboro creates, he is able to hide his true self while attacking from below.

skills.name: Exploding Kunai
skills.description: Oboro throws a kunai with an exploding tag on it dealing 15 damage to all enemies. During 'Haze Clone' this skill is improved and will cost 1 less random chakra.

skills.name: Earth Swim
skills.description: Hiding in the ground, Oboro waits and then attacks one enemy from behind dealing 20 damage and stunning their physical and mental skills for 1 turn. During Haze Clones this skill is improved and targets all enemies and costs 1 random chakra less.

skills.name: Haze Clone
skills.description: The following 3 turns 'Exploding Kunai' will cost 1 less chakra and 'Earth Swim' will affect all enemies and will cost 1 less random chakra. During this time Oboro gains 30 points of destructible defense and is invulnerable to physical and mental skills.

skills.name: Oboro Hiding Tactics
skills.description: This skill makes Oboro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shigure
description: A genin from the village of rain, Shigure is a strong, but arrogant ninja. Using a number of Umbrellas, Shigure is able to attack all enemies with sharp senbon needles, or focus everything to one enemy.

skills.name: Umbrella Toss
skills.description: Shigure tosses his umbrellas into the air, gaining four Umbrella Counters. During this time, Shigure can use this skill again to remove all Umbrella Counters and gain 10 points of damage reduction for each Umbrella Counter for 1 turn. Senbon Shower will last 1 additional turn.

skills.name: Senbon Shower
skills.description: Shigure unleashes needles over all enemies, dealing 15 damage to all enemies. This skill can't be countered or reflected. This skill takes up one Umbrella Counter.

skills.name: Senbon Barrage
skills.description: Shigure  deals 15 damage to one enemy for each Umbrella Counter. This skill will cost 1 less random for each Umbrella Counter used, and will remove all Umbrella Counters when used. The cost and damage of this skill will reset when 'Umbrella Toss' is used.

skills.name: Umbrella Block
skills.description: This skill makes Shigure invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Akadou Yoroi
description: A sound village genin that infiltrated Konoha as a spy, Yoroi is a capable, but brash ninja who likes to toy with his enemies. Yoroi is capable of absorbing the strength of his enemies, and make it his own in more than one way.

skills.name: Energy Drain
skills.description: Yoroi touches one enemy, stealing 15 health from them and lowering their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Yoroi will deal 5 more damage with all his skills.

skills.name: Draining Assault
skills.description: Yoroi charges at one enemy, attacking them with multiple energy drains, stealing 10 health from them each turn for 3 turns, lowering their non-affliction damage by 5 for 2 turns and increasing the damage Yoroi deals with all his skills by 5 for 2 turns.

skills.name: Chakra Focus
skills.description: Yoroi endows his attacks. For 2 turns, if 'Energy Drain' or 'Draining Assault' are used, they will also steal 1 chakra for their duration.

skills.name: Chakra Block
skills.description: This skill makes Akadou Yoroi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tsurugi Misumi
description: A sound village genin that infiltrated Konoha as a spy, Misumi likes taking the initiative when it comes to combat. Misumi can flex his muscles and bones, twisting them to wrap around his enemies, or even defend his allies.

skills.name: Flexible Twisting Joints
skills.description: Using his distractingly loose joints, Misumi targets an ally or an enemy. If used on an enemy he will deal 15 damage that ignores invulnerability to them. If used on an ally, that ally will gain 15 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Soft Physique Modification
skills.description: Misumi wraps around one enemy. For 2 turns all new harmful skills used on Misumi will be reflected to that enemy instead. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable.

skills.name: Tighten Joints
skills.description: Misumi tightens his joints gaining 15 destructible defense. If 'Soft Physique Modification' is active, the enemy that it is active on will also receive 20 damage and be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Misumi Block
skills.description: This skill makes Tsurugi Misumi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Umino Iruka
description: Iruka is one of the instructors at the Konoha ninja academy. He is a well rounded ninja with diverse abilities and skills. Created and submitted by OMGWTFitzBEN.

skills.name: Shuriken Throw
skills.description: Iruka throws a shuriken, dealing 20 damage to one enemy, and an additional 10 damage for each 25 health Iruka has lost.

skills.name: Ally Shield
skills.description: Using himself as a shield, Iruka makes one ally invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Sealed Bombs Square Formation
skills.description: Iruka sets a trap. The following turn, if one enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will receive 40 damage and for 1 turn, will receive an additional 25 damage from physical and chakra skills. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Iruka Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Umino Iruka invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Mizuki
description: An instructor for Konoha, Mizuki is a chuunin, and old friend of Iruka that over time grew jealous and petty. While Mizuki doesn't have any special abilities, he knows to instead be patient, and wait until the right time to strike.

skills.name: Kunai Assault
skills.description: Mizuki throws a number of kunai at one enemy, dealing 15 damage to them for 2 turns.

skills.name: Execution Shuriken
skills.description: MMizuki throws one of his giant shurikens at one enemy, dealing 20 damage to them, and an additional 10 damage for each 20 health they have lost. Mizuki only carries 2 of these giant shurikens at any time and can only use this skill twice in a game.

skills.name: Genjutsu Ambush Tactics
skills.description: The following turn, Mizuki will become invulnerable, 'Kunai Assault' will deal 30 damage instantly and 'Execution Shuriken' will deal 30 additional damage. This skill is invisible the first turn, and will end if Mizuki successful receives new harmful damage.

skills.name: Mizuki Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Mizuki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Jiroubou
description: Jiroubou is the largest member of the Sound four. His fighting style involves powerful physical attacks in combination with manipulation of earth.

skills.name: Arhat Fist
skills.description: This skill does 30 damage to one enemy. The following turn 'Earth Mausoleum Dumpling' will deal an additional 5 damage.

skills.name: Earth Mausoleum Dumpling
skills.description: This skill does 20 damage to all enemies. The following turn 'Arhat Fist' will deal 10 additional damage.

skills.name: Earth Prison of Magnificent Nothingness
skills.description: For 3 turns, Jiroubou and all allies gain 35 points of destructible defense. During this time one enemy has 1 random chakra stolen. This skill will end if Jiroubou's destructible defense is destroyed.

skills.name: Terra Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Jiroubou invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kidoumaru
description: Kidoumaru has spider-like skills. He has 6 arms and has the ability to create weapons and traps with a strange golden web-like liquid.

skills.name: Spider Bow: Fierce Rip
skills.description: Kidoumaru fires a special arrow made of enzymes from his mouth at one enemy dealing 50 piercing damage.

skills.name: Summoning: Kyodaigumo
skills.description: Kidoumaru summons Kyodaigumo who creates a massive amount of small spiders that do 10 damage each turn for 5 turns to all enemies. The following 5 turns, Kidoumaru gains 10 points of damage reduction and any new skill an enemy uses will have its cooldown increased by 1.

skills.name: Spiral Web
skills.description: Kidoumaru protects himself or an ally. The first harmful physical skill used on that character will be countered. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Golden Armor
skills.description: This skill makes Kidoumaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tayuya
description: A member of the Sound Five, Tayuya is the only female member of the team, and the most foul-mouthed one too. Tayuya uses her flute to both trap her enemies in genjutsu while controlling the beasts she summons.

skills.name: Summoning: Doki
skills.description: Tayuya summons the Doki Demons. The Doki Demons will deal 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Tayuya will have 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, 'Demonic Flute: Phantom Wave' can be used.

skills.name: Demonic Flute: Phantom Wave
skills.description: Illusionary ghosts come out of the Doki dealing 10 affliction damage to one enemy and removing one random chakra. Requires 'Summoning: Doki' to be active on Tayuya.

skills.name: Demonic Flute
skills.description: Playing a genjutsu melody on her flute, Tayuya stuns all enemies' skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Tayuya invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sakon
description: Sakon usually carries a strange head around on his back. This head turns out to be his brother Ukon, who can also exit Sakon and enter other bodies in order to destroy them.

skills.name: Gattling Punch
skills.description: Using one body Sakon and Ukon rapidly punch one enemy dealing 40 damage. During 'Parasite Demon Demolition', this skill will deal 20 damage.

skills.name: Parasite Demon Technique
skills.description: Sakon deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. During this time, Sakon will have 15 points of damage reduction and 'Gatling Punch' will deal 20 less damage. This skill can't be used while active, will end if 'Rest' or 'Summoning Rashoumon' is used, or the enemy dies.

skills.name: Rest
skills.description: Ukon rests within the body of Sakon. This heals Sakon for 30 health. If Sakon uses this skill during 'Parasite Demon Demolition' it will end.

skills.name: Summoning Rashoumon
skills.description: This skill makes Sakon invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kimimaro
description: A member of the Sound Five, Kimimaro was the leader, and the strongest of the team before his illness. Kimimaro's bloodline grants him unstoppable offensive power, however, his illness is slowly killing him, giving him precious little time.

skills.name: Dance of the Camellia
skills.description: Kimimaro uses his superior taijutsu and arm bones as a sword dealing 30 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Afterwards, Kimimaro will receive 5 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Dance of the Clematis
skills.description: Kimimaro attacks one enemy with an extremely hard and sharp bone spear, dealing 40 damage to them and stunning them for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Afterwards, Kimimaro will receive 10 affliction damage.

skills.name: Dance of the Seedling Fern
skills.description: Kimimaro creates a forest of sharp bones, dealing 30 damage to all enemies and reducing all enemy physical and chakra damage by 20 for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected. Afterwards, Kimimaro will receive 15 affliction damage for 2 turns.*

skills.name: Bone Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Kimimaro invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Mitarashi Anko
description: A former student of Orochimaru and bearer of the Cursed Seal, Anko is now a teacher at Konoha. Having learned from Orochimaru, Anko utilizes various types of poisons and forbidden techniques to dismantle her enemies.

skills.name: Dual Pin
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko deals 5 damage to one enemy and makes them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Twin Snakes Mutual Death'.

skills.name: Dragon Fire
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, these enemies will take 5 additional damage from Mitarashi Anko's other skills.

skills.name: Hidden Shadow Snake Hand
skills.description: Mitarashi Anko deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy. The following 3 turns, this enemy will take 5 affliction damage each turn. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Quick Reflexes
skills.description: This skill makes Mitarashi Anko invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Twin Snakes Mutual Death
skills.description: Anko delivers a large dose of poison to both herself and one affected by 'Dual Pin', instantly killing both targets. This skill cannot be ignored.

name: Gekko Hayate
description: A Jounin and exam proctor from Konoha; while sickly and afflicted with a chronic cough, he is calm and composed. Hayate is an expert sword user, and is well acquainted with using stealth to increase the deadliness of his attacks.

skills.name: Crescent Moon Slash
skills.description: Hayate jumps on an enemy from above, dealing 15 damage to them. Hayate will deal 5 additional damage with his skills for the rest of the game.

skills.name: Dance of the Crescent Moon
skills.description: Using both his sword and genjutsu together, Hayate will deal 30 damage to one enemy and the first harmful skill used against him on the following turn will be countered.

skills.name: Meld into Shadows
skills.description: Hayate gains 25 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. The following turn, he will gain 15 points of damage reduction. The turn after, he will gain 5 points of damage reduction. The following 3 turns, Hayate will deal 10 more damage with his skills.

skills.name: Backflip Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Gekko Hayate invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shizune
description: Shizune is the aid of Tsunade. A competent combatant using poisons and needles, she is also a highly skilled medic who is able to heal her allies.

skills.name: Prepared Needle Shot
skills.description: Shizune shoots hidden needles at one enemy dealing 15 damage to them.

skills.name: Poison Mist
skills.description: Shizune breathes a poison cloud on one enemy who takes 10 affliction damage for 3 turns. This skill may not be used on an enemy currently affected.

skills.name: Healing Resuscitation Regeneration
skills.description: Using this advanced healing technique Shizune heals one ally for 35 health and removes all enemy afflictions from them.

skills.name: Shizune Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Shizune invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hatake Kakashi
description: Kakashi is the sensei of Naruto, Sakura, and Sasuke. With his Sharingan he is able to turn his foes skills back upon themselves and can cause severe damage with his Raikiri and Nin-Dogs skills.

skills.name: Sharingan Reflect
skills.description: Kakashi targets himself or an ally for 2 turns, the next harmful skill will be countered and this skill will permanently be replace with a copy of the countered skill.

skills.name: Summoning: Ninja Dogs
skills.description: Kakashi targets one opponent dealing 5 damage to them and stunning their skills for one turn. That enemy will take 5 additional damage from physical and chakra skills permanently. If Sharingan has successfully countered a skill, Ninja Dogs will also decrease targets non affliction damage by 10 for 2 turns.

skills.name: Raikiri
skills.description: Kakashi targets one enemy dealing 35 piercing damage to them. This skill will deal 5 additional damage for each use of it. This skill will also deals 5 additional damage if Sharigan has sucessfully Countered a skill.

skills.name: Clever Hiding
skills.description: This skill makes Hatake Kakashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yuhi Kurenai
description: The squad leader of Team 8, Kurenai is a caring woman and a close companion to Asuma. Kurenai is a genjutsu master, being able to use a variety of illusions to disrupt and trap her enemies in nigh impossible to escape illusions.

skills.name: Demonic Illusion: Entrap
skills.description: Kurenai hinders an enemy with her genjutsu, dealing 10 damage to them, making them unable to become invulnerable or reduce damage, reducing their non-affliction damage by 10, and increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random for 2 turns.

skills.name: Illusionary Tree Meld
skills.description: Kurenai melds into an illusionary tree, gaining 10 destructible defense, and an additional 5 for each skill other than this skill Kurenai has used. The additional destructible defense will be reset when this skill is used.

skills.name: Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death
skills.description: Kurenai imprisons an enemy in a powerful genjutsu, stunning them for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Tree Binding Death Attack'.

skills.name: Vanishing Illusion
skills.description: This skill makes Yuhi Kurenai invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Tree Binding Death Attack
skills.description: Attacking through her genjutsu, Kurenai deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy affected by 'Demonic Illusion: Tree Binding Death'.

name: Sarutobi Asuma
description: Sarutobi Asuma is the leader of Team 10. He uses trench knives extended by his chakra to fight and protect his teammates.

skills.name: Flying Swallow
skills.description: Asuma attacks all enemies, dealing 20 damage to them for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, Asuma's team will have 15 points of damage reduction. This skill will be replaced by 'Finishing Blow' and 'Sharpen Blades' will be replaced by 'Flying Kick'.* This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Sharpen Blades
skills.description: Asuma sharpens his blades, increasing the duration of 'Flying Swallow' by 1 turn the next time it is used and grants 5 permanent distructible defense. This effect stacks and will end when 'Flying Swallow' is used.

skills.name: Self Sacrifice
skills.description: Asuma continually protects one ally. All harmful skills used on that ally will be reflected to Asuma. During this time, Asuma can use this skill again for no cost to cancel it.

skills.name: Knife Block
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Asuma invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Finishing Blow
skills.description: Finishing off an enemy with a powerful blow, Asuma will deal 35 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Flying Kick
skills.description: Jumping from the sky, Asuma kicks an enemy in their face, dealing 35 damage to them and stunning them for 1 turn.

name: Maito Gai
description: Gai is the sensei of Lee, Tenten and Neji. He and Lee both use the same fighting style, Strong Fist, which involves high-speed attacks and the opening of inner chakra gates.

skills.name: Leaf Whirlwind
skills.description: Gai kicks with a strong whirlwind hitting one enemy for 30 damage. During 'Sixth Gate Opening' this skill is improved and deals 60 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Sixth Gate Opening
skills.description: Gai receives 40 affliction damage.* This effect can't kill Gai. The following 2 turns, 'Leaf Whirlwind' will deal 60 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability. During this time Gai is invulnerable.

skills.name: Counter Punch
skills.description: Gai singles out one enemy to counter attack. If that enemy uses a harmful skill they will be countered and receive 30 damage. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Gai Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Maito Gai invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uzumaki Kushina
description: The powerful and passionate mother of Naruto, known for her unique sealing techniques and fierce protection of her loved ones.

skills.name: Four Symbols Seal
skills.description: By using a powerful seal, Kushina deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy, stuns them for 1 turn and marks them permanently. For 2 turns, the enemy’s stun effects will last 1 turn less and its drain effects will remove 1 less chakra. This skill will deal 5 additional damage if used on a marked enemy.

skills.name: Life Link
skills.description: Kushina targets both of her allies. For 1 turn, all enemy skills used on them will be reflected to Kushina and kushina will be unable to be killed. This skill is replaced by 'Life Transfer' permanently. This skill cannot be ignored.

skills.name: Adamantine Sealing Chains
skills.description: Kushina surrounds one enemy with chains. Removing all helpful skills from them, stunning their skills and then making them invulnerable to all further skills for 2 turns. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Adamantine Covering Chains
skills.description: This skill makes Uzumaki Kushina invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Life Transfer
skills.description: Kushina heals all her allies 20 health and makes them unable to be killed for 1 turn. Kushina will take 10 affliction damage that cannot kill her. This skill becomes Life Link after use. Kushina cannot die from this skill.

name: Namikaze Minato
description: A Jounin, and Squad Leader of Konoha, known as the Yellow Flash, Minato is the father of Naruto. Minato fights using space-time jutsu and a number of unique kunai to teleport around the battlefield.

skills.name: Flying Thunder God
skills.description: Using his teleportation abilities, Minato either attacks one enemy, dealing 30 damage to them. Minato will also become invulnerable from non mental skills for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Wide Area Sensing
skills.description: Minato senses the area around the battlefield. For 2 turns, all enemies will be unable to become invulnerable or reduce damage. This skill ignores invulnerability. During this time, Minato will gain 1 random chakra each turn.

skills.name: Space-Time Marking
skills.description: For 2 turns Minato will be able to use 'Flying Thunder God' to defend an ally making them invulnerable to non-mental skills for 1 turn. Minato will also become invulnerable for 1 turn. While active, 'Flying Thunder God' will deal 30 piercing damage.

skills.name: Flying Light
skills.description: This skill makes Namikaze Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Baki
description: A Jounin of the Sand Village, and the leader of Gaara's team; Baki is cruel and ruthless, despite his normally calm nature. Baki fights using both taijutsu and ninjutsu together with top of the line Sand Village branded Flak Jackets.

skills.name: Sudden Strike
skills.description: A simple, blindingly fast attack leaving an illusionary trail to throw off enemies. Baki does 20 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Wind Blade
skills.description: Baki conjures a maelstrom of blade-like wind and does 40 piercing damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Flak Jacket
skills.description: Baki puts on a specialized flak jacket from the sand village on himself, or one ally granting that character 50 destructible defense for 4 turns and during this time, that character will ignore all non-damage harmful effects except chakra cost changes.

skills.name: Baki Teleportation
skills.description: This skill makes Baki invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yakushi Kabuto
description: Kabuto is the close assistant and confidant to Orochimaru; calm, logical and highly intelligent, Kabuto is a mystery to many. Kabuto knows how to disrupt an enemy's body while regenerating his own

skills.name: Chakra Scalpel
skills.description: Kabuto slices an enemy with chakra scalpels, dealing 20 piercing damage to them. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills will cost an additional random chakra and they will receive an additional 5 damage from physical and chakra damaging skills.

skills.name: Yin Healing Wound Destruction
skills.description: When Kabuto uses this skill he removes all enemy affliction skills from himself, and afterwards, he will heal 15 health for 5 turns.

skills.name: Temple of Nirvana
skills.description: Kabuto creates a large scale genjutsu. The following turn any enemy that doesn't use a new skill will be stunned for 1 turn and the following turn physical and chakra skills will deal an additional 10 damage to that enemy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Dead Soul Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Yakushi Kabuto invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tsunade
description: One of the three sannins, Tsunade is a gambling, sake drinking loving woman with a tough exterior but soft interior. Tsunade is an expert at medical jutsu, using it to remove all her wounds, or delivering high impact kicks.

skills.name: Heavenly Foot of Pain
skills.description: With her insane strength, Tsunade performs an axe kick on one enemy dealing 30 damage while stunning their physical and Chakra skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Creation Rebirth
skills.description: Tsunade unleashes her stored chakra, setting her health to 100 and removing all harmful effects on her.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Katsuyu
skills.description: Summoning Katsuyu, Tsunade instantly heals herself and her allies for 40 health. For the rest of the game, Tsunade's team will heal 5 health each turn, and this skill will be replaced by 'Slug Division'. This skill will end when Tsunade dies.

skills.name: Elbow Block
skills.description: This skill makes Tsunade invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Slug Division
skills.description: Tsunade and her team are healed for 10 points and gain 10 points of destructible defense.

name: Jiraiya
description: Jiraiya is one of the Legendary Sannin. With his various frog-based jutsus he is able to both hinder and damage all of his opponents.

skills.name: Great Spitting Fireball
skills.description: Jiraiya spits out a large amount of fire, dealing 20 damage to one enemy, and 10 to all others.

skills.name: Summoning: Toad Mouth Bind
skills.description: Jiraiya summons the stomach of a giant toad, placing all characters within it. For 2 turns, enemies will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and during this time if Jiraiya or one of his allies is damaged with a new non-affliction skill, they will become invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Gamabunta
skills.description: Jiraiya summons the great toad Gamabunta, who deals 25 affliction damage to the enemy team. For the rest of the game, the enemy team will receive an additional 5 damage from affliction skills and this skill will be replaced by 'Toad Oil Flame Bullet'.

skills.name: Spiked Buddha
skills.description: This skill makes Jiraiya invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Toad Oil Flame Bullet
skills.description: Gamabunta spits even more oil at the enemy team, followed by Jiraiya spitting fire at them, dealing 15 damage to all enemies.

name: Orochimaru
description: One of the three sannins, Orochimaru craves nothing more than to learn all the jutsu and abilities in the world. Orochimaru uses his snake summons and cursed seals to various effects, beating down his enemies regardless of their defenses.

skills.name: Kusanagi
skills.description: Orochimaru strikes swiftly, destroying all destructible defense one enemy has, and dealing 25 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Cursed Seal Mark
skills.description: Orochimaru places a cursed seal on one ally or enemy, who takes 15 affliction damage and gains 1 chakra. This skills ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Manda
skills.description: Orochimaru summons Manda, who deals an initial 45 damage to one enemy. For the rest of the game, Orochimaru will gain 1 random chakra a turn and this skill will be replaced by 'Constrict and Bite'. This skill will end when Orochimaru dies.

skills.name: Earth Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Constrict and Bite
skills.description: Manda wraps around an enemy, stunning them for 1 turn. The following turn, Manda will eat them, dealing 25 damage to them.

name: ET Senju Hashirama
description: The First Hokage and the founder of the Hidden Village of Konoha, Shodai Hokage has the ability to create and manipulate trees. This ability to give life shows the extent of his power.

skills.name: Tree Wave Destruction
skills.description: Sending out his trees in all directions, Hashirama deals 10 damage to all enemies and his team will gain 5 points of destructible defense. During 'A World of Trees', this skill will have no cooldown.

skills.name: Tree Strangulation
skills.description: Hashirama sends his trees out, capturing one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them and stunning their physical and chakra skills. During 'A World of Trees', this skill will stun all skills.

skills.name: A World of Trees
skills.description: Hashirama creates a forest of trees, increasing the cost of all enemies' non-mental skills by 1 random and their cooldowns by 1 for 2 turns. The following two turns, this skill can be used again to grant Hashirama's team 35 points of destructible defense and remove all their cooldowns.

skills.name: Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes ET Senju Hashirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: ET Senju Tobirama
description: The second Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village; Tobirama, a member of the Senju clan, puts the well being of the village and people above all else. Tobirama is a master of many jutsu, using both ninjutsu and genjutsu to stop the enemies in different ways.

skills.name: Water Assault
skills.description: Tobirama encases one enemy in water, making them ignore all helpful effects except chakra cost changes for 1 turn and dealing 15 damage to them.

skills.name: Water Colliding Wave
skills.description: Summoning a giant wave of water, Tobirama uses it to attack the enemy team for 3 turns, dealing 15 damage to them and stunning their affliction skills each turn. The following 3 turns, 'Water Assault' will deal an additional 15 damage*.

skills.name: Bringer of Darkness
skills.description: Tobirama plunges the battlefield into darkness, making his team invulnerable to all harmful physical and mental skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Encampment Wall
skills.description: This skill makes ET Senju Tobirama invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sarutobi Hiruzen
description: The third and most recent Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village to die; Hiruzen, known as the God of Shinobi was considered to be one of the strongest ninja to ever live in his prime. While powerful using just his normal jutsu, Hiruzen is able to pull out a trump card when desperation strikes.

skills.name: Fire Dragon Flame Bulletl
skills.description: Sarutobi Hiruzen deals 30 affliction damage to one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will receive an additional 10 affliction damage.

skills.name: Dead Demon Consuming Seal
skills.description: One enemy receives 40 affliction damage, is stunned and cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable each turn. Hiruzen himself receives 20 affliction damage and is stunned every turn. This skill cannot be removed or ignored and will end when Hiruzen dies.

skills.name: Major Summoning: Enma
skills.description: Hiruzen and his team will become invulnerable for 1 turn. For the rest of the game, Enma will deal 5 damage to the enemy team and Hiruzen and his team will gain 5 points of damage reduction and this skill will be replaced by 'Adamantine Prison Wall'. This skill will end when Hiruzen dies.

skills.name: Earth-Style Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Hiruzen invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Adamantine Prison
skills.description: Hiruzen makes his team unable to be killed and grants them 20 points of damage reduction for 1 turn.

name: Yondaime Minato
description: The fourth Hokage of the Hidden Leaf Village; considered to be one of the fastest ninja ever, Minato is a talented man, and the father of Uzumaki Naruto, and the one who sealed the Kyuubi inside of him. Having mastered the time-space skills, Minato is capable of merging them with powerful ninjutsu for powerful effects.

skills.name: Hiraishin Rasengan
skills.description: Minato teleports behind an enemy, dealing 35 damage that ignores invulnerability to them. The following turn, this skill will cost only 1 Ninjutsu. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Space-Time Barrier
skills.description: Using his space-time abilities, Minato targets one ally or himself. For 2 turns, the first new harmful skill used on that ally will be reflected onto the enemy team and this skill will end. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Partial Dead Demon Consuming Seal
skills.description: Using a partial seal, Minato seals part of one enemy away, dealing 25 affliction damage to them, and permanently lowering their non-affliction damage by 5. Minato will also receive 15 affliction damage.

skills.name: Kunai Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Yondaime Minato invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Demon Brothers
description: A duo of Mist ninja who work for Zabuza, the Demon Brothers specialize in assassinating their targets with their shuriken chain. Using their weapons and teamwork, the Demon Brothers can gang up on one enemy, disable him, and then kill him.

skills.name: Chain Wrap
skills.description: One of the Demon Brothers throws his chain around one enemy, stunning their non-mental skills for 1 turn. The following turn, 'Chain Shred' will be usable on that enemy and this skill will be replaced by 'Chain Shred'.

skills.name: Poison Gauntlet
skills.description: One Demon Brother attacks with his gauntlet, dealing 30 damage to one enemy. If this skill is used on an enemy affected by 'Chain Wrap', it will deal an additional 10 damage.

skills.name: Water Melding
skills.description: The Demon Brothers hide in water, gaining 20 points of destructible defense and 1 taijutsu chakra.

skills.name: Vanish
skills.description: This skill makes Demon Brothers invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chain Shred
skills.description: The demon brothers unite, to shread one enemy affected by 'Chain Wrap' dealing 45 piercing damage to that enemy and re-applying the stunning and vulnerability effect of 'Chain Wrap' to them.

name: Haku
description: The sole survivor of the Yuki clan, and the subordinate of Zabuza; Haku, despite being young, holds enough potential strength to surpass almost any ninja. Using his ice based bloodline, and his intelligence, Haku can attack and defend nearly simultaneously.

skills.name: Flying Water Needles of Death
skills.description: Haku flings a number of water based needles dealing 30 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Acupuncture
skills.description: Haku targets one ally's or enemy's vital points. If used on an enemy, they will be stunned their non-mental skills for 1 turn. If used on an ally, all stun effects on them will be removed and they will ignore all stun effects for 1 turn.

skills.name: Demonic Mirroring Ice Crystals
skills.description: Haku creates numerous mirrors, and for 3 turns, Haku will become invulnerable from non-mental skills. The following 3 turns 'Flying Water Needles of Death' will target all enemies and 'Acupuncture' will target all allies and enemies while costing 1 additional random chakra.

skills.name: Needle Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Haku invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Momochi Zabuza
description: Zabuza is a missing-nin from the Hidden Mist Village that specializes in silent assassination. Using the various ninjutsu abilities Zabuza has, he is able to attack his enemies all at once, or stealthily try to kill them.

skills.name: Soundless Murder
skills.description: Using this advanced assasination, Zabuza deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy. During 'Hidden Mist', this skill will deal 45 piercing damage to one enemy that ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Water Dragon Missile
skills.description: Zabuza knocks all enemies down with a giant wave of water dealing 10 damage and stunning their physical and affliction skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hidden Mist
skills.description: For 2 turns, all enemies will have their physical and mental skills cost 1 additional random chakra and Zabuza gains 5 points of damage reduction. The following 2 turns, 'Soundless Murder' will deal 45 piercing damage that ignores invulnerability. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Water Clone Zabuza
skills.description: This skill makes Momochi Zabuza invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kyuubi Naruto
description: Naruto's anger and desperation has forced the Kyuubi's chakra to come up to the surface, changing Naruto into a single-minded beast with a nearly endless amount of chakra. With the Kyuubi chakra around Naruto, he is able to unleash powerful waves of raw chakra to endow his power further, or gather it back to guard and heal him.

skills.name: Kyuubi Rasengan
skills.description: Naruto slams his Kyuubi empowered rasengan onto one enemy, dealing 35 damage and stunning them for 1 turn. Naruto will also receive 5 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Kyuubi Rage
skills.description: The Kyuubi's chakra is let loose, dealing 15 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. During this time, 'Kyuubi Rasengan' will deal an additional 10 damage. 'Kyuubi Chakra' may not be used during this time.*

skills.name: Kyuubi Chakra
skills.description: Naruto begins using the Kyuubi's chakra, healing himself 15 health for 5 turns. During this time, Naruto will have 10 points of damage reduction and 'Kyuubi Rasengan' will deal 10 less damage.* 'Kyuubi Rage' may not be used during this time.

skills.name: Kyuubi Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Kyuubi Naruto invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Cursed Seal Sasuke
description: Having gotten used to the Cursed Seal, Sasuke is able to draw Orochimaru's vile chakra through it, becoming a twisted hideous version of himself, but also getting stronger and faster. With the Cursed Seal, Sasuke's powers have exponentially increased, allowing him to pierce or trap enemies with his dark chakra.

skills.name: Corrupt Chidori
skills.description: Mixing a chidori with his corrupt chakra, Sasuke deals 45 piercing damage to one enemy and for 2 turns, will reduce their non-affliction damage by 10.

skills.name: Katon: Goukakyuu no Jutsu
skills.description: Sasuke launches a giant fireball dealing 20 affliction damage to one enemy. If that enemy uses a skill for 1 turn they will take 10 affliction damage. During Cursed Seal Activation, this skill will be improved for 1 turn will cost 1 random chakra

skills.name: Cursed Seal
skills.description: Sasuke taps into the power of Orochimaru's cursed seal, becoming invulnerable to Physical and Chakra skills for 1 turn and taking 15 affliction damage. The following turn 'Corrupt Chidori' will cost 1 less ninjutsu chakra and 'Katon: Goukakyuu no Jutsu' will cost 1 random chakra. For 2 turns This skill becomes 'Dark Void'.

skills.name: Sharingan Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Cursed Seal Sasuke invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Dark Void
skills.description: Expunging the corrupt chakra, Sasuke engulfs one enemy, stunning them for 2 turns, and making them invulnerable to all skills. When this skill ends, that enemy will receive 50 damage. This skill will end if Sasuke dies.

name: Shukaku Gaara
description: Having lived inside him the whole time, Shukaku is one of the nine tailed beasts and is very eager to escape and cause chaos to the world. While Shukaku slowly takes over Gaara, his own power increases, allowing him to demolish his foes with powerful sand attacks.

skills.name: Sand Claw
skills.description: Gaara attacks with a claw of concentrated sand, dealing 30 damage to one enemy and gaining 10 destructible defense.

skills.name: Constricting Sand Prison
skills.description: Gaara traps an enemy with sand, dealing 10 damage to them each turn. During this time, the first skill that enemy uses will be countered and this skill will end.

skills.name: Sand Transformation
skills.description: Each turn, for 5 turns, Gaara will gain 10 destructible defense. When this skill ends, Gaara will transform into the Shukaku for 3 turns, reducing the cost of 'Sand Claw' by 1 random and replacing 'Constricting Sand Prison' and 'Sand Transformation'.

skills.name: Thick Sand Coat
skills.description: This skill makes Shukaku Gaara invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Drilling Air Bullet
skills.description: Sending forth a powerful ball of wind, Gaara deals 60 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: True Awakening
skills.description: Gaara truly lets Shukaku awaken from inside him, letting it take over. The Following turn, 'Sand Claw' and 'Drilling Air Bullet' will deal double damage.

name: Hoshigaki Kisame
description: Formerly one of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist Village, Kisame is an S-Rank missing nin. He is Itachi's partner and a member of a mysterious organization. Designed with Redxmaverick.

skills.name: Samehada Slash
skills.description: Using his sword, Samehada, Kisame slashes one enemy who takes 20 damage and stunning their chakra and mental skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Samehada Shred
skills.description: Kisame unwraps Samehada and shreds one enemy. For 2 turns that enemy will receive 15 damage and will have one random chakra stolen.

skills.name: Water Shark Projectile
skills.description: Using a stream of compressed water Kisame does 20 damage to one enemy and stuns their physical and affliction skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Samehada Scale Block
skills.description: This skill makes Hoshigaki Kisame invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Uchiha Itachi
description: The only other surviving Uchiha, Itachi is a master of doujutsu, an S-Rank missing nin, and a member of Akatsuki, having been partnered with Hoshigaki Kisame. Despite being powerful, Itachi is slowly going blind, making his abilities weaker, but when Itachi activates his Sharingan he becomes an unstoppable force of pure power.

skills.name: Mangekyo Sharingan
skills.description: Uchiha Itachi becomes invulnerable, enhancing 'Amaterasu' and 'Tsukuyomi', increasing their cooldowns by 2, and doubling their costs. During this time, Uchiha Itachi will take 15 affliction damage each turn*, ignore healing, and Uchiha Itachi can use this skill again for no cost to cancel it.

skills.name: Amaterasu
skills.description: Itachi burns one enemy with his flames, dealing 15 affliction damage to them and each following turn, they will receive 5 affliction damage a turn. This skill does not stack. If used during 'Mangekyou Sharingan', this skill will deal 20 affliction damage to all enemies and 10 permanent affliction damage the following turn. This skill will end if Itachi dies.

skills.name: Tsukuyomi
skills.description: Itachi mentally tortures one enemy for 3 days and nights in a matter of seconds, dealing 20 damage to them and stunning them for 1 turn. If used during 'Mangekyou Sharingan', this skill will last 3 turns.

skills.name: Sharingan Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Itachi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Temujin
description: Temujin is a young man from an unknown continent. Born as the heir of the main branch of his clan, Temujin has the ability to create and seal away the Stone of Gelel. Temujin is extremely loyal to Haido; wishing to be of use to him, Temujin trained hard to become a powerful fighter.

skills.name: Raging Thunder
skills.description: Temujin targets one enemy. The following turn, that enemy will take 20 piercing damage. For 1 turn, their helpful skills will last 1 turn less. If that enemy use a new harmful skill they will take 5 additional damage from 'Raging Thunder Blast' for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Raging Thunder Threat
skills.description: Temujin targets one enemy for 1 turn. During this time, if they use a new skill, they will take 30 piercing damage. If that enemy dont use a new skill Temujin will gain 1 bloodline Chakra

skills.name: Retractable Shield
skills.description: Temujin target himself for 1 turn. Any non-mental harmful enemy skills used on Temujin will be countered and the countered enemy will permanently deal 5 less non-affliction damage. This effect stacks and this skill is invisible.

skills.name: Temujin Sword Parry
skills.description: This skill makes Temujin invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Raging Thunder Blast
skills.description: Temujin deals 25 piercing damage to the enemy affected by 'Raging Thunder'. For 1 turn, any enemy that uses a new skill on Temujin will take 15 piercing damage. This skill is invisible.

name: Uzumaki Naruto (S)
description: After nearly three years of secluded training with Jiraiya, Naruto(s) has returned to Konoha with a greatly improved arsenal of ninja skills.

skills.name: Oodama Rasengan
skills.description: Using shadow clones to greatly enhance the size and strength of his rasengan, Naruto deals 40 damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Mass Shadow Clones
skills.description: Naruto creates a giant amount of clones. The following turn, Naruto will counter the first new harmful skill used on him and 'Oodama Rasengan' will be replaced by 'Rasenshuriken'. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Chakra Boost
skills.description: Naruto cycles his chakra to give him a surge of power, removing all harmful skills on him and gaining 1 taijutsu and ninjutsu chakra. The following turn, Naruto will also gain 10 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Shadow Clone Save
skills.description: This skill makes Uzumaki Naruto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Rasenshuriken
skills.description: Using his recently created clones, Naruto hurls an even more powerful Rasengan at one enemy, dealing 50 piercing damage to them. This skill will deal an additional 25 damage to any enemy countered by 'Mass Shadow Clones'. This skill ignores invulnerability.

name: Sarutobi Konohamaru
description: The grandson of the 3rd Hokage, Hiruzen, Konohamaru has spent his youth working hard to accomplish his dream of one day following under his grandfather's steps. With his hard work, Konohamaru has learned actual abilities that flow around his agility and speed.

skills.name: Konohamaru Rasengan
skills.description: Taking his time to prepare his rasengan, Konohamaru targets one enemy, and the following turn, that enemy will receive 25 damage. This skill will deal an additional 15 damage if that enemy used a new skill that turn. This skill is invisible and ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Agile Backflip
skills.description: Konohamaru uses his agility to counter the next new non-mental skill used on him. Each time this skill is used, it will have its cost permanently increased by 1 random. This skill cannot be used while active. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Quick Recovery
skills.description: Konohamaru helps one ally back on their feet if they are knocked out. The following turn, the first time that ally's health reaches 0, they will have their health set to 25. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Konohamaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Haruno Sakura (S)
description: With her extensive training under Tsunade for the last two and a half years, Sakura has gained a greater understanding of healing and the human body. While Sakura's physical strength and healing prowess have both increased, her greatest ability is a powerful chakra storing seal taught to her by Tsunade.

skills.name: Chakra Enhanced Punch
skills.description: Enhancing her attack with finely controlled chakra, Sakura does 25 damage to one enemy. While 'Strength of a Hundred Seal' is active, this skill will deal 35 damage to one enemy, and 10 to all others.

skills.name: Superior Healing
skills.description: With her superior healing skills, Sakura heals half of one ally's missing health, rounded down, and removes all enemy affliction effects from them. While 'Strength of a Hundred Seal' is active, this skill will cost 1 random and have no cooldown.

skills.name: Strength of a Hundred Seal
skills.description: Haruno Sakura (S) gains 3 seals. During this time, each skill that Haruno Sakura (S) uses other than her invulnerability will use up 1 Seal. While 'Chakra Gathering' is active, Haruno Sakura (S) can use this skill again at no cost to restore 20 health and remove all harmful effects on her.

skills.name: Insightful Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Haruno Sakura (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sai (S)
description: A current member of the Elite ANBU Root, Sai is a quiet, but expressive individual with a mysterious past. Sai uses a set of brushes with a special ink to give life to his art, from tigers to lions to bears, that allow him to compete with his enemies.

skills.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Lions
skills.description: Sai creates a number of ink lions to attack one enemy dealing 30 damage to them, and for 1 turn, Sai will gain 15 destructible defense.

skills.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Snake
skills.description: Sai creates a snake made of ink to trap one enemy, stunning their physical and mental skills for 1 turn. During this time, that enemy will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. This skill ignores invulnerability. During 'Adaptive Painting', this skill will be replaced.

skills.name: Adaptive Painting
skills.description: For 3 turns, any ally that is stunned will become invulnerable for 1 turn; any ally that has chakra removed/stolen will gain 1 random chakra; any ally that receives successful new non-affliction damage will increase Sai's damage by 10 for 1 turn. The following 3 turns, 'SBID: Snake' will be replaced.

skills.name: Ink Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Sai (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Super Beast Imitating Drawing: Bird
skills.description: Sai summons a giant ink bird that crashes to one enemy, dealing 25 damage to them and stunning their physical and chakra skills for 1 turn.

name: Inuzuka Kiba (S)
description: Over the last several years. Kiba, and his dog, Akamaru have grown considerably, not wanting to be left last in their group. Having improved their team work, and provided they are given enough time, Kiba and Akamaru can become unstoppable rampaging beasts.

skills.name: Man-Beast Clone
skills.description: Akamaru turns into a clone of Kiba, giving him 10 points of damage reduction and making him ignore all stuns for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Three-Headed Wolf'.

skills.name: Rotating Fang
skills.description: Kiba spins, dealing 30 damage to one enemy. During 'Man-Beast Clone' this skill will also deal 20 damage to one other random enemy. During 'Three-Headed Wolf' this skill will also deal 20 damage to all other enemies.

skills.name: Fang Over Fang
skills.description: Kiba deals 40 damage to one enemy and will lower their non-affliction damage by 5 permanently.* During 'Man-Beast Clone' this skill will deal an additional 5 damage. During 'Three-Headed Wolf' this skill will deal an additional 20 damage.

skills.name: Hide in the Shade
skills.description: This skill makes Inuzuka Kiba (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Three-Headed Wolf
skills.description: Kiba ends the 'Man-Beast Clone' and transforms into a three-headed wolf, gaining 25 points of damage reduction and ignoring all stuns and drains For 3 turns. This skill is replaced by 'Tail Chasing Rotating Fang'.

skills.name: Tail Chasing Rotating Fang
skills.description: Deals 30 damage to all enemies and stuns their physical and chakra skills for 1 turn.

name: Aburame Shino (S)
description: Still as mysterious and secretive as ever, Shino has improved greatly over the years, learning and practicing with his loyal bugs. With his new found mastery, Shino can disable enemies even harder while slowly waiting for his bugs to erupt from their bodies and destroy them.

skills.name: Insect Swarm
skills.description: Shino sends out wave of his insect army at one enemy, dealing 15 affliction damage to them for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, that enemy will be invulnerable to all friendly skills and during this time this skill will be replaced by 'Insect Consumption'.

skills.name: Insect Barricade
skills.description: The following turn, the first new harmful skill used on himself or one ally will be countered, 'Parasitic Giant Beetle Infestation' will be placed on the countered enemy and then activated. If this skill does not counter an enemy, Shino will gain 1 Bloodline chakra. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Parasitic Giant Beetle Infestation
skills.description: Shino infects one enemy with a small bug. 3 turns after this skill has been used, the bug bursts out, dealing 25 damage to them and activating all other copies of this skill on that enemy. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Insect Cocoon
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Shino (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Insect Consumption
skills.description: Shino commands his insects to drain the chakra of one enemy affected by 'Insect Swarm' stealing 1 random chakra from them and increasing the damage that enemy receives from 'Insect Swarm' by 5 that turn.

name: Hyuuga Hinata (S)
