description: With the Chuunin Exam behind her, and with Naruto's words deep in her heart, Hinata has grown and become stronger and a woman. With her mastery of the Hyuuga clan tactics, Hinata can give life to powerful chakra lions while hindering her enemies' chakra paths.

skills.name: Pressure Point Closure
skills.description: Hinata closes an enemy's pressure point dealing 10 damage to one enemy, increasing the cost of their skills by 1 random and removing all stacks of 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field' from them. During 'Hinata - Eight Trigrams Field' this skill will deal an additional 10 damage.

skills.name: Gentle Step Twin Lion Fists
skills.description: Hinata creates a chakra lion and attack, dealing 30 damage to one enemy and removing 1 random chakra from them.

skills.name: Hinata: Eight Trigrams Field
skills.description: For 3 turns, if an enemy uses a new harmful skill, the chakra cost increase of 'Pressure-Point Closure' will last 1 additional turn and the following 3 turns 'Pressure Point Closure' will be enhanced.

skills.name: Byakugan Sight
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hinata (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nara Shikamaru (S)
description: Once known to be one of the laziest ninja, Shikamaru has worked tireless to become not only stronger, but a leader too. More than ever before, Shikamaru excels at coming up with long winded and convoluted plans meant to defeat any enemies in his path.

skills.name: Shadow Sewing
skills.description: Shikamaru sends several tendrils of shadow to one enemy, dealing 35 damage to them and stunning their non-mental skills for 1 turn. Afterwards, this skill will be replaced by 'Shadow Sewing - Hold' for 1 turn.

skills.name: Long-Range Tactics
skills.description: Shikamaru goes long. For 4 turns, each time Shikamaru uses a new harmful skill, he will become invulnerable for 1 turn. If Shikamaru receives new non-affliction damage, this skill will be ignored for 1 turn. The following 4 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Final Explosion'.

skills.name: Expert Analysis
skills.description: By carefully analyzing one enemy, Shikamaru figures out their weakness. For 3 turns, any time that enemy uses a new skill that enemy will be unable to become invulnerable or reduce damage and all helpful counter and reflect skills on them will be ignored for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Panicked Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Shikamaru (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Shadow Sewing - Hold
skills.description: Shikamaru continues to maintain his technique, stunning the non-mental skills of the enemy affected by 'Shadow Sewing' or this skill for 1 turn and dealing 20 damage to him. After that, this skill remains active on the enemy.

skills.name: Final Explosion
skills.description: Using his shadow technique, his analysis and his range, Shikamaru traps one enemy in a pit, and blows them up. One enemy affected by 'Shadow Sewing' or 'Shadow Sewing - Hold' and 'Expert Analysis' while Shikamaru is invulnerable through 'Long-Range Tactics' will receive 100 damage.

name: Akimichi Chouji (S)
description: After nearly three years, Chouji has developed in both strength and size, mastering the Akimichi clan techniques. No longer does Chouji need the Akimichi pills to tap into his true strength, instead, he merely needs to control his chakra and become a force to reckon with.

skills.name: Butterfly Bullet Bombing
skills.description: Chouji slams his fist into an enemy's face, first ignoring all harmful effects other than chakra cost changes for 1 turn and then dealing 25 damage to one enemy. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and Chouji's skills will cost 2 additional random afterwards.

skills.name: Human Bullet Tank
skills.description: Chouji rolls over one enemy for 2 turns, dealing 15 damage to them. During this time, Chouji will counter all new physical and chakra skills used on him.* This skill will increase the cost of Chouji's skills by 1 random each turn.

skills.name: Butterfly Control
skills.description: Using his new found control, Chouji taps into even more power. This skill will be replaced by 'Super-Slap'. Each turn, the existing cost of Chouji's skills will be decreased by 1 random.

skills.name: Butterfly Block
skills.description: This skill makes Akimichi Chouji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Super-Slap
skills.description: Chouji slaps an enemy down with a fistful of chakra, removing all Harmfull effects on him and then dealing 25 damage to one enemy, this skill cannot be countered or reflected and chouji skills cost 2 additional random afterwards.

name: Yamanaka Ino (S)
description: Not one to be left behind, Ino has trained non-stop to improve her abilities and teamwork. With her improved techniques, Ino can not only control her enemies, but her allies too all while seeing everything on the battlefield.

skills.name: Mind Body Switch Interference
skills.description: Ino prepares to interfere with one enemy for 1 turn. The following turn, that enemy will receive 15 damage and if that enemy uses a new harmful skill, they will be countered and this skill will be replaced by that skill for 1 turn. This skill is invisible and can copy all skills.

skills.name: Proxy Surveillance
skills.description: For 3 turns all new invisible skills will be visible. During this time any enemy uses a new harmful skill will take 5 piercing damage. This skill can't be countered or reflected. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Mind Clone Switch
skills.description: Ino enters the mind of both of her allies, making their bodies fight on regardless of their state. For 2 turns, both of Ino's allies will ignore all harmful effects other than damage and chakra cost changes. This skill is invisible and will end if Ino dies.

skills.name: Hide
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Ino (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Rock Lee (S)
description: Now a chuunin, Lee has trained endlessly with Gai, and not only learned new abilities, but has learned what it truly means to fight. In battle, Lee now fights for his friends and allies, growing stronger as they fall around him.

skills.name: Leaf Rising Wind
skills.description: Lee tries to hinder an enemy, dealing 15 damage to them and lowering their non-affliction damage by 10 for 2 turns. This skill will deal an additional 10 damage for each ally that is dead.

skills.name: Leaf Great Whirlwind
skills.description: Lee gains momentum, dealing 20 damage to one enemy and gaining 10 points of damage reduction for 1 turn. The following turn this skill will deal an additional 10 damage and grant 10 more damage reduction. This skill will deal an additional 10 damage for every ally that has been killed.

skills.name: Maximum Force Blast
skills.description: Mixing the power of his gates, his allies and everything Lee fights for, he unleashes a powerful attack at one enemy dealing 20 damage to them. This skill will deal an additional 10 damage for each ally that is dead, and an additional 10 damage for each 30 health that Lee has lost.

skills.name: Jumping Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Rock Lee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tenten (S)
description: Now a chuunin, Tenten has added a myriad of powerful and potent weapons in her arsenal, even procuring the legendary fan of the sage of the six paths. Having an arsenal of weapons at her side, Tenten can choose to fight at different levels, upgrading her weapons until she finds something suitable for her battle.

skills.name: Kunai Grenade
skills.description: Tenten throws an explosive filled with kunai at one enemy dealing 20 damage to them and 10 damage to all other enemies.

skills.name: Chain Spin
skills.description: Tenten spins her chain around wildly making her team invulnerable to all physical skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Weapon Upgrade
skills.description: Tenten gains 5 destructible defense. The first time this skill is used, it will replace 'Kunai Grenade' and 'Chain Spin'. The second time it is used they will be replaced again. The third time this skill is used, it will reset and her skills will revert back to the original ones.

skills.name: Leaping Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Tenten (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Heavenly Chain Disaster
skills.description: Tenten rains blindingly fast projectiles upon the battlefield, dealing 25 damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Iron Protection Wall
skills.description: Tenten produces a massive metal dome from a very small scroll, granting 25 permanent destructible defense to her allies and herself.

skills.name: Bashousen: Coil of Fire
skills.description: Using the Sage of the Six Path's legendary leaf fan, Tenten blasts her enemies with a sea of raging fire, dealing 15 physical and 15 affliction damage* to them and the following 3 turns they will receive 5 affliction damage*.

skills.name: Bashousen: Coil of Wind
skills.description: Using the Bashounen to throw a gust of wind, the following turn all non-mental skills used on Tenten or her team will be reflected back to the enemy. This skill is invisible.

name: Hyuuga Neji (S)
description: The only of the original genins to become a Jounin, Neji has only increased his already powerful set of abilities and skills during the near three years of time. While still being able to rely on his pressure point attacks, Neji is now also able to unleash giant waves of chakra for brutish damage as well.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm
skills.description: Neji sends a blast of chakra filled air at one enemy's vital points, dealing 20 damage to them and removing 1 random chakra from them. During 'Neji: Eight Trigrams Field' this skill deals 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Mountain Crusher
skills.description: Forgoing preciseness, Neji unleashes a giant wave of chakra at one enemy, destroying any destructible defense they have and dealing 45 damage to them. During 'Neji: Eight Trigrams Field' this skill will remove 1 random chakra.

skills.name: Neji: Eight Trigrams Field
skills.description: Neji use his Eight Trigrams Field and gains 5 points of damage reduction for 4 turns. During this time 'Eight Trigrams Vacuum Palm' and 'Eight Trigrams Mountain Crusher' are will be enhanced. This skill becomes 'Pressure Point Strike' for 4 turns.

skills.name: Byakugan Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Neji (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Pressure Point Strike
skills.description: Neji deals 5 damage to the enemy  and removes 1 random chakra from them.

name: Hatake Kakashi (S)
description: Kakashi has not let the years pass by idle, and has trained as hard as any other, improving his sharingan and his own unique jutsu. While Kakashi's raikiri is still a potent finisher, he is now also able to rely on his kamui, aiming it at his enemies or even rescuing his allies.

skills.name: Lightning Beast Fang
skills.description: Kakashi forms his raikiri into a lightning dog, controlling it and dealing 25 piercing damage to one enemy. If this skill successfully dealt damage to the enemy, they will be stunned for 1 turn. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Finishing Raikiri'.

skills.name: Kakashi Kamui
skills.description: If used on an enemy, they will receive 40 piercing damage and for 1 turn their cooldowns will increase by 1 and the cost of their skills increased by 1 random. If used on an ally, all harmful effects on them will be removed and they will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Team Tactics
skills.description: For 3 turns, Kakashi's allies will have the cooldown of their skills reduced by 1 for 3 turns. The following 3 turns, the first new harmful non-unique skill used by one enemy will be copied and will replace this skill for 1 turn.*

skills.name: Shadow Clone Stand-in
skills.description: This skill makes Hatake Kakashi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Finishing Raikiri
skills.description: Kakashi moves to finish off an enemy, dealing 35 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill will deal an additional 10 damage to that enemy if they are stunned or if 'Lightning Beast Fang' was used on them the previous turn.

name: Yamato
description: A member of the secretive ANBU organization and a man who was once injected with the cells of Hashirama, the 1st Hokage. Due to the cells that live inside of him, Yamato is capable of small scale wood element abilities, from trapping enemies to protecting his comrades.

skills.name: Bliss-Bringing Hands
skills.description: Yamato uses an ancient technique that seals one enemy's power, dealing 30 damage to them and for 1 turn will ignore all effects that improve their skills.

skills.name: Wood Clone
skills.description: Yamato protects one ally or himself with a clone of wood for 1 turn, countering the first non-mental harmful skill used against them, dealing 20 damage to the enemy and granting that ally 20 destructible defense. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Four-Pillar Prison
skills.description: Yamato creates a barrier of wood around one enemy or ally. If used on an enemy, that enemy will have their non-mental skills stunned for 2 turns. If used on an ally, that ally will gain 40 destructible defense. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Wood Locking Wall
skills.description: This skill makes Yamato invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Maito Gai (S)
description: Still the leader of Team Gai, Gai is not one to let himself fall behind in terms of training and strength. Gai no longer feels the need to go straight into the highest level of gates that he can, instead taking his time, until the time requires the green beast of Konoha to go all out.

skills.name: Nunchaku Taijutsu
skills.description: Using his weapon expertise, Gai deals 10 damage to one enemy for 3 turns. During this time, if an enemy uses a new harmful non mental skill on Gai, he will deal 10 damage to them.

skills.name: Fiery Kick
skills.description: Gai slams his leg onto one enemy, dealing 35 damage to one enemy and reducing all non-affliction damage they deal by 20 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Single Gate Release
skills.description: Gai receives 5 affliction damage*, but permanently gains 5 damage reduction and increases the initial damage of 'Nunchaku Taijutsu' and 'Fiery Kick' by 5. At 6 gates, 'Fiery Kick will be replaced by 'Morning Peacock' and at 7 gates, be replaced by 'Daytime Tiger'. This skill can be used 7 times.

skills.name: Muscle Block
skills.description: This skill makes Maito Gai (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Morning Peacock
skills.description: With unparalleled speed and power, Guy deals 60 damage to an enemy and stuns them for 1 turn.

skills.name: Daytime Tiger
skills.description: Using one single punch, Guy deals 300 damage to one enemy.

name: Sarutobi Asuma (S)
description: Somehow continuing to avoid lung cancer, Asuma has remained the leader of Team 10 through the years. With the secret techniques of the fire temple, Asuma is able to attack and defend while waiting for the opportune moment to slice some heads off.

skills.name: Thousand-Armed Murder
skills.description: Asuma gains 20 destructible defense and instantly deals 25 damage to one enemy. During this time, he can use this skill again for 1 random to deal 20 damage to one enemy. When this skill ends, Asuma will be unable to use this skill for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ash Pile Burning
skills.description: Asuma breaths out a cloud of combustible ash to all enemies each turn, increasing the cooldowns of their skills by 1 turn. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Ash Pile Burning - Ignite'.

skills.name: Decapitate
skills.description: Showing no mercy, Asuma targets one enemy, and if that enemy's health is 25 or less, he will instantly kill that enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability and cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Sarutobi Asuma (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ash Pile Burning - Ignite
skills.description: Asuma lights up the ash on the battlefield, dealing 10 affliction damage to all enemies for each stack of 'Ash Pile Cloud' on them. This skill will end 'Ash Pile Cloud' and it cannot be countered or reflected and ignores invulnerability.

name: Izumo & Kotetsu
description: A synchronized duo from the Hidden Leaf Village, known for their coordinated combat tactics.

skills.name: Izumo Rush
skills.description: Izumo targets all enemies permanently. Each time they do not use a new skill Izumo & Kotetsu damage will be increased by 5 for one turn (This effect stacks). Izumo and Kotetsu gains 5 points of Destructible Defense and 5 points of Damage Reduction for 1 turn. This skill becomes Kotetsu Rush permanently after and Starch Syrup Captruring Field may now be used. This skill cannot be reflected and removed.

skills.name: Starch Syrup Capturing Field
skills.description: Izumo and Kotetsu targets all enemies for 3 turns and they will take 5 piercing damage. If they use a new harmful skill, the main class of that skill will do 5 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn.*

skills.name: Mace Crush
skills.description: Izumo and Kotetsu targets one enemy, dealing 5 damage and 5 piercing damage to them. The target of this skill will have all their harmful skills stunned for one turn.

skills.name: Tag Team
skills.description: Izumo and Kotetsu becomes invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Kotetsu Rush
skills.description: Kotetsu targets one enemy permanently. Each time they use a new skill Izume & Kotetsu damage will be increased by 5 for one turn. Izumo and Kotetsu gains 5 points of Destructible Defense and 5 Damage Reduction for 1 turn. Mace Crush may now be used. This skill cannot be reflected or removed.

name: Yamashiro Aoba
description: A Konoha jounin assigned to hunt down members of Akatsuki, Aoba while reserved in public, is more than willing to boast and brag in private. While a man of many talents, Aoba specializes in genjutsu that takes on the form of crows, being able to use them for all manner of purposes.

skills.name: Scattering Thousand Crows Technique
skills.description: Aoba summons a massive amount of crows, dealing 5 damage to all enemies for 4 turns. The following 4 turns, Aoba and his team will have 5 points of damage reduction*. This skill can stack.

skills.name: Revenge of the Murder
skills.description: For 3 turns, if one ally is killed, they will have their health set to 5, will have all their skills replaced by 'Convergence of a Murder' and will ignore all further skills. At the end of their next turn, that ally will die; this effect cannot be stopped, ignored or removed. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Convergence of a Murder
skills.description: Aoba commands his crows to pick off one enemy, dealing 30 damage to them. This skill will deal an additional 5 damage for each active 'Scattering Thousand Crows Technique' on the target.

skills.name: Crow Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Yamashiro Aoba invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Inuzuka Tsume
description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Inuzuka clan, and the mother of Kiba, Tsume, much like her son, is a wild and impatient woman with an often odd sense of humor. Like other members of her clan, Tsume fights one with her companion, Kuromaru, while allowing her wild instincts to take over.

skills.name: Summon Kuromaru
skills.description: Tsume calls Kuromaru to aid her. The following 4 turns, she will gain 10 points of damage reduction. During this time, this skill will be replaced by 'Fierce Bite' and any enemy that uses a new harmful non-affliction skill on Tsume will receive 10 damage.

skills.name: Passing Fang
skills.description: Tsume spins, dealing 15 piercing damage to one enemy for 2 turns. All stun skills that enemy uses will also be decreased by 2 turns. If 'Summon Kuromaru' is active, this skill will deal 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Flashbang
skills.description: Tsume covers herself and her allies, making them invulnerable to Physical and Mental skills for 1 turn. Tsume only carries 3 of these grenades with her at all times, so this skill can only be used three times in a game.

skills.name: Man-Beast Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Inuzuka Tsume invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Fierce Bite
skills.description: Kuromaru jumps at one enemy dealing 25 damage which ignores invulnerability. If that enemy dies this turn, then for 2 turns Tsume will have her damage increased by 10, will ignore all stun effects and cannot be killed.

name: Akimichi Chouza (S)
description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Akimichi clan, and the father of Chouji, Chouza is a brave, wise man that instills great confidence in his allies. In a fight, Chouza uses his size to become a nuisance to his enemies while granting safety to his team.

skills.name: Chain Bind
skills.description: Chouza slows down an enemy, dealing 5 damage to them and lowering all physical and chakra damage they deal by 10 for 1 turn. Chouza's team will also gain 5 destructible defense.

skills.name: Chouza Meat Tank
skills.description: Chouza begins rolling for 3 turns, dealing 15 damage to one enemy and granting his team 10 destructible defense for 1 turn each turn. During this time, the damage lowering effect of 'Chain Bind' will last 1 additional turn on that enemy.

skills.name: Partial-Size Smash
skills.description: If used on an enemy, for 1 turn, the next non-mental harmful skill they use will be countered. If used on an ally, for 1 turn, the next non-mental harmful skill used on them will be countered. The countered enemy will receive 10 damage. This skill is invisible and ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Chouza Block
skills.description: This skill makes Akimichi Chouza (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Nara Shikaku
description: The father of Nara Shikamaru, and the head of the Nara clan, Shikaku is a cool-headed Jounin of Konoha who will go to any lengths to protect his friends and family. In battle, Shikaku is merciless, combining his impressive shadow imitation skills with his unparalleled intellect to grab victory for his team.

skills.name: Master Shadow Imitation
skills.description: Shikaku grabs an enemy with his shadow, forcing his body to do as he pleases. That enemy will receive 20 damage and then will have their non-mental skills stunned for 2 turns. The following turn, this skill will be replaced by 'Shadow Dispersion'.

skills.name: Black Spider Lily
skills.description: Shikaku extends his shadows out to his enemies. For 3 turns, Shikaku's skills will deal an additional 10 damage to them, and each time they use a new stun skill, then for 3 turns the next time Shikaku stuns that enemy, they will be stunned for 1 additional turn.

skills.name: Problem Analysis
skills.description: Shikaku targets himself or one ally for 1 turn, and the first new harmful non-affliction damage skill that is used on them will deal no damage and that ally will gain destructible defense equal to the original damage of that skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Human Barricade
skills.description: This skill makes Nara Shikaku invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Shadow Dispersion
skills.description: Nara Shikaku targets all enemies not affected by 'Master Shadow Imitation', stunning their non-mental skills for 1 turn and dealing 20 damage to them.

name: Yamanaka Inoichi
description: A Konoha jounin, a member of the Yamanaka clan, and the father of Ino, Inoichi is a very calm, analytical man who can solve nearly any dilemma. While fighting, Inoichi much prefers targeting an enemy's mind, tearing it apart while remaining unscratched himself.

skills.name: Psycho Mind Transmission
skills.description: Inoichi targets an opponent, dealing 20 piercing damage and stunning their non-physical skills for 1 turn. During this time if Inoichi is targetted by a new non-physical skill they will have Mental Invasion applied to them.

skills.name: Sensing Water Sphere
skills.description: Inoichi targets all allies, For 1 Turn any opponent that uses a new offensive skill will have Psycho Mind Transmittion applied to them, this skill is invisible and during this time Inoichi gains 10 damage reduction.

skills.name: Mental Invasion
skills.description: Inoichi targets an opponent, stun skills placed on this opponent will last an additional turn and they will take 10 additional damage from mental skills permanently.

skills.name: Mobile Barrier
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Inoichi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hyuuga Hiashi
description: Head of the Hyuuga clan, and father to both Hinata and Hanabi, Hiashi is a strict, but caring man who would do anything for his clan. In battle, there is no equal when it comes to mastering the Hyuuga clan abilitie

skills.name: Master Gentle Fist
skills.description: Hiashi slams one enemy with his fists, dealing 20 damage to them and removing 1 random chakra from them. The following turn, one other random enemy, will receive 20 damage and lose 1 random chakra; the target of this skill is invisible.

skills.name: Master Revolving Heaven
skills.description: Hiashi spins, becoming invulnerable for 1 turn and dealing 15 damage to one enemy and 10 to all other enemies for 2 turns.

skills.name: Eight Trigrams Vacuum Wall Palm
skills.description: Hiashi gets ready to blast an enemy's attack back. The next turn, the first enemy to use a new harmful skill on one ally or himself will have that skill reflected back to one random enemy.

skills.name: Hiashi Byakugan
skills.description: This skill makes Hyuuga Hiashi invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Aburame Torune
description: A member of the Aburame clan, and a member of Anbu Root, Torune can almost be said to have no personality of his own, other than his undying loyalty to Danzo. Unlike other members of his clan, Torune employs a unique type of bug that lets him outright destroy both flesh and chakra.

skills.name: Kunai Wave
skills.description: Aburame Torune targets one enemy, dealing 15 damage for 2 turns. Their skills will cost 1 additional random chakra during this time.

skills.name: Nano Beetles
skills.description: Aburame Torune targets one enemy. That enemy will take 5 affliction this turn and then 5 affliction damage permanently the following turn. This skill cannot be ignored or removed and this skill stacks. This skill becomes Jar Of Poison Permanently.

skills.name: Swarm Guidance
skills.description: Aburame Torune targets one enemy dealing 30 affliction damage and reducing their Physical and Chakra skills damage by 5 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Super Leap
skills.description: This skill makes Aburame Torune invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Jar of Poison
skills.description: Aburame Torune deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies, dealing 5 additional damage to those affected by Nano Beetles. This skill is replaced by Nano Beetles permanently.

name: Yamanaka Fu
description: Yamanaka Fu (S) is a member of the Yamanaka clan and a member of Anbu Root. Fu is a skilled genjutsu user and the partner of Torune.

skills.name: Tanto Slash
skills.description: Fu slashes with his tanto, dealing 25 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill will deal an additional 15 damage to an enemy affected by 'Mind Puppet Switch'.

skills.name: Quickened Mind Body Switch
skills.description: Fu disrupts one enemy, stunning all their helpful skills and making them invulnerable to all helpful skills for 2 turns. During this time, 'Tanto Slash' will deal an additional 15 damage to that enemy.

skills.name: Mind Puppet Switch
skills.description: Fu sets up a trap using a puppet. For 1 turns, the first enemy that uses a new harmful physical or chakra skill against Fu or one ally will be countered and will have all their skills replaced by 'Mind Puppet Switch - Attack' for 2 turns and this skill will end.

skills.name: High Jump
skills.description: This skill makes Yamanaka Fu invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Mind Puppet Switch - Attack
skills.description: The enemy will have their skills replaced by this one for 2 turns and will deal 15 damage.

name: Tsunade (S)
description: No longer just a Sannin, Tsunade is the new Kage of Konoha, and has taken a large amount of responsibility on her shoulders. Knowing that holding back is no longer an option, Tsunade taps into her seal to gain an impressive power over her foes.

skills.name: Heavenly Spear Kick
skills.description: Tsunade spears one enemy with her foot, dealing 20 piercing damage to them. If an ally is being healed by 'Enhanced Healing Wave', they will also be unable to be killed for 1 turn. While improved, this skill will deal 40 piercing damage, and will destroy destructible defense and will cost 1 additinal random.

skills.name: Enhanced Healing Wave
skills.description: Tsunade pours chakra into one ally, healing them for 30 health. Additionally, that character will heal an additional 10 health for 2 turns. If empowered, this skill will heal 40 health instantly.

skills.name: Tsunade: Strength of a Hundred Seal
skills.description: Tsunade taps into her seal, healing 25 health. Tsunade gains 2 empowered, and the next time uses a skill, it will be empowered and remove 1 empowered stack. If this skill is used while empowered, it will heal Tsunade 50 health and grant her 2 random chakra.

skills.name: Tsunade Protection
skills.description: This skill makes this character invulnerable for 1 turn. While improved, this skill makes whole team invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shimura Danzo
description: The leader of Anbu Root, Danzo wishes nothing more than to become the Hokage, and while an extreme man with few morals, Danzo only wishes to protect Konoha. Thanks to Orochimaru, Danzo has gained access to many forbidden sharingan techniques that allow him to dominate any foe before him.

skills.name: Vacuum Sphere
skills.description: Danzo Target all enemies and deals 10 damage and for 1 turn if they use a new skill they will take 10 affliction damage.

skills.name: Summuning Jutsu: Baku
skills.description: Danzo summons Baku and deals 15 damage to all enemies and reduces they non affliction damage by 5 points for 2 turns. This skill becomes 'Vacuum Blade' for 2 turns.

skills.name: Danzo: Izanagi
skills.description: Danzo Target himself and For 1 turn will ignore all damage dealt on him. This skill is invisible

skills.name: Hashirama's Cell Tree Creation
skills.description: This skill makes Shimura Danzo invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Vacuum Blade
skills.description: Boosting his kunai with a vacuum of razor sharp wind danzo stabs an enemy dealing 25 affliction damage to them. This skill cannot be countered and ignore invulnerability.

name: Chiyo (S)
description: The grandmother of Sasori(s) and elder ninja of the Sand Village, Chiyo is a well known and accomplished puppet master and builder.

skills.name: White Secret Attack Taijutsu Rampage
skills.description: Chiyo (S) directs some of her puppets to wreak havoc upon the battlefield dealing 20 damage to one random enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: Sanbou Kyuukai
skills.description: This skill does 20 piercing damage to one enemy and that enemy has their physical or mental skills stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Ally Puppetry
skills.description: Chiyo (S) controls one ally like a puppet. That ally gains 10 damage reduction for 2 turns. During this time their non-affliction melee skills will deal 5 more damage.

skills.name: Chakra Shield
skills.description: This skill makes Chiyo (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Maki (S)
description: Maki (S) is a kunoichi of the Hidden Sand Village and the student of Pakura. Maki (S) is also a member of the Ninja Alliance Sealing Squad.

skills.name: Weighted Net Scroll
skills.description: Maki (S) uses Weighted Net Scroll on herself or an ally, gaining 10 damage reduction for 1 turn. If any enemy uses a new skill on Maki (S) or an ally their non-mental skills will be stunned the following turn. This effect ignores invulnerability. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Humidified Cloth
skills.description: Using Humidified Cloth Maki (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy's offensive skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Binding Cloth
skills.description: Maki (S) uses Binding Cloth on one enemy stunning their physical and chakra skills for 2 turns. Physical skills will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill while it is in effect.

skills.name: Cloth Shelter
skills.description: This skill makes Maki (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kazekage Gaara (S)
description: After a few short years and much soul-searching, Gaara(s) has risen to be his village's Kazekage. Rather than destroying others he now protects those he cares about to prove his existence.

skills.name: Desert Missile
skills.description: Using thin ropes of sand Kazekage Gaara hunts down one enemy dealing 5 piercing damage to them. New skills used by the target of this skill will deal 10 less damage for 1 turn.

skills.name: Desert Prison
skills.description: Kazekage Gaara entraps and crushes one enemy in a giant maw of sand stunning their skills for 1 turn and dealing 10 damage to them.

skills.name: Sand Summoning
skills.description: All Gaara's allies gain 10 destructible defense. When first used, damage Gaara deals is improved and tripled, and Gaara gains 5 points of damage reduction. On the second use, damage dealt is improved and quintupled, and Gaara gains 10 points of damage reduction and all allies gain 10 destructible defense. This skill can only be used twice.

skills.name: Sand Sphere
skills.description: This skill makes Kazekage Gaara (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kankuro (S)
description: In the last couple years Kankuro(s) has become a Jounin and has created a new puppet. He is now able to harness three puppets at once and is a more versatile combatant. Original Design: Yaseen16

skills.name: Kuroari Trap
skills.description: If used on an enemy, for 1 turn, the next harmful skill they use will be countered. If used on himself or an ally, for 1 turn, the first harmful skill used on them will be countered. The countered enemy will receive 5 additional from affliciton skills. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Karasu Knives
skills.description: Kankuro (s) uses Karasu's poisoned knives to attack an enemy dealing 10 affliction damage to them and that enemy will take 10 affliction damage the following turn.

skills.name: Sanshouo Shield
skills.description: Kankuro uses Sanshouo to block enemy attacks. For 3 turns Kankuro (s) and his allies gain 10 damage reduction and are immune to enemy affliction damage. During this time This skill becomes 'Salamander Puppet'*.

skills.name: Puppet Distraction
skills.description: This skill makes Kankuro(s) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Salamander Puppet
skills.description: Kankuro (S) uses Salamander Puppet on 1 ally or himself. The target of this skill will have 10 damage reduction for 1 turn.

name: Temari (S)
description: Temari (S) has grown over the years. She is now a Jounin as well as the sister of Kankuro and Gaara. Temari is also the Hidden Sand Village's ambassador to the Hidden Leaf Village.

skills.name: Second Moon
skills.description: Temari gains 15 permanent damage reduction, and Wind Scythe deals 10 more damage permanently. This skill becomes Third Moon permanently after use.

skills.name: Ally Protection
skills.description: Temari (S) uses Ally Protection on 1 teammate. For 1 turn that teammate will gain 20 damage reduction and be unable to be killed by enemy skills.

skills.name: Wind Scythe
skills.description: Using Wind Scythe Temari (S) deals 20 damage to 1 enemy.

skills.name: Fan Offensive Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Temari (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Third Moon
skills.description: Deals 20 damage to all enemies, and they deal 5 points less damage for 1 turn.

name: Nii Yugito (S)
description: A kunoichi from Kumogakure, Nii Yugito holds within her the two-tailed beast. She has full control over the bijuu Nibi, and is able to transform into it and use its powers to fight. Original Design: lder

skills.name: Nibi Transformation
skills.description: Yugito unlocks the power of her bijuu and takes on its form. She gains 15 damage reduction and can use both Spectral Fireball and Claw Swipe. This skill is permanent and cannot be used while in effect.

skills.name: Spectral Fireball
skills.description: By spitting a large fireball from her mouth, Yugito deals 30 damage to one enemy. That enemy will deal 10 less damage for 1 turn. Each time this skill is used it will deal 5 more damage (this effect stacks).

skills.name: Claw Swipe
skills.description: Yugito takes a huge swipe of her claw dealing 15 damage to one enemy and 5 damage to all other enemies. This skill will deal 5 more damage each use (this effect stacks).

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: This skill make Yugito Ni invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Utakata (S)
description: Utakata (S) is a missing nin from the Hidden Mist Village and the jinchuuriki for the six tailed slug Rokubi. A distant person most of the time Utakata (S) is a kind shinobi who uses bubble line ninjutsu in many ways.

skills.name: Soap Bubble Ninjutsu
skills.description: Utakata (S) uses his specialized Soap Bubble Ninjutsu to target one enemy. The target of this skill will lose all destructible defense and then take 15 piercing damage.

skills.name: Drowning Bubble Technique
skills.description: Utakata (S) uses Drowning Bubble Technique on one enemy dealing 10 affliction damage permanently. Soap Bubble Ninjutsu will deal an additional 5 damage to any enemy affected by this skill. This skill cannot be used on an enemy currently being affected by it. This skill ends when Utakata (S) dies.

skills.name: Rokubi Transformation
skills.description: Utakata (S) uses Rokubi Transformation effortlessly to heal himself for 25 health points and gain 15 unpierceable damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Bubble Dome
skills.description: This skill makes Utakata (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Four Tail Kyuubi Naruto (S)
description: Naruto(s), after giving into his rage and manifesting a fourth tail ceases to be himself. In this state Naruto(s) becomes a mindless being of rage and destruction but the price is his own life.

skills.name: Four Tails Transformation
skills.description: Naruto gains 20 points of damage reduction and 15 points of destructible defense. He takes 5 affliction damage each turn. He ignores heals and stuns. Naruto can use his other skills while this skill is in use. This skill may be used once and is permanent.

skills.name: Shockwave Smash
skills.description: Four Tail Kyuubi Naruto (S) smashes the ground before him creating a huge shockwave. All enemies take 20 damage. This skill may only be used during Four Tails Transformation.

skills.name: Compressed Chakra Blast
skills.description: Four Tail Kyuubi Naruto (S) gathers an immense amount of chakra and fires it at one enemy who takes 50 piercing damage. This skill may only be used during Four Tails Transformation.

skills.name: Skin of Chakra
skills.description: This skill makes Four Tail Kyuubi Naruto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Hachibi Bee (S)
description: Hachibi Bee (S) has complete control of the Hachibi within him. This allows Bee to use all forms of the Hachibi's power at will making him a true killer shinobi.

skills.name: Chakra Bones
skills.description: Hachibi Bee (S) uses Chakra Bones. Hachibi Bee gains 5 unpierceable damage reduction permanently and will also deal an additional 5 damage permanently when this skill is used. Hachibi Bee can only use Chakra Bones 5 times and this skill is permanent.

skills.name: Lariat
skills.description: Hachibi Bee (S) targets 1 enemy dealing 20 damage. For 1 turn that enemy's stamina is depleted, if that enemy uses a skill the cooldown of that skill will be increased by 1 turn.

skills.name: Tailed Beast Bomb
skills.description: Hachibi Bee (S) uses Tailed Beast Bomb on 1 enemy dealing 25 damage. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Jinchuriki Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Hachibi Bee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kitsuchi (S)
description: Kitsuchi (S) is a jounin of the Hidden Rock Village and the son of the Sandaime Tsuchikage as well as the father of Kurotsuchi. Kitsuchi (S) is also the commander of the allied shinobi forces second division.

skills.name: Granite Fist
skills.description: Kitsuchi (S) uses Granite Fist on one enemy dealing 35 damage. That enemy will be unable to use counter skills (this is a stun effect).

skills.name: Earth Rising Excavation
skills.description: Using Earth Rising Excavation Kitsuchi (S) targets all enemies dealing 10 damage. The following turn all stun and counter skills used by those enemies will last 1 turn less. Damage dealt to Kitsuchi (S) will be reduced by 10 points during this skill.

skills.name: Earth Release Sandwich
skills.description: Kitsuchi (S) uses Earth Release Sandwich on one enemy dealing 45 damage. That enemy's skills will be stunned for 2 turns.

skills.name: Earth Shelter
skills.description: This skill makes Kitsuchi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Kurotsuchi (S)
description: Kurotsuchi (S) is a shinobi of the Hidden Rock Village and the Partner of Akatsuchi. She is also the granddaughter of the third Tsuchikage.

skills.name: Lava Quicklime
skills.description: Kurotsuchi (S) uses Lava Quicklime on one enemy dealing 25 damage. Kurotsuchi (S) gains 15 damage reduction for one turn when this skill is used. The following turn if Water Trumpet is used on the target of this skill the target will stun their physical and chakra skills.

skills.name: Water Trumpet
skills.description: Kurotsuchi (S) uses Water Trumpet on one enemy dealing 20 damage. If that enemy is affected by Lava quicklime that character's physical and chakra skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Earth Spears
skills.description: Kurotsuchi (S) uses Earth Spears on all enemies dealing 20 damage. For 1 turn all enemies affected by this skill will be invulnerable to friendly skills.

skills.name: Evasiveness
skills.description: This skill makes Kurotsuchi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Shee (S)
description: Shee (S) is a jounin of the Hidden Cloud Village and a sensor. Shee is one of the Raikage's most reliable shinobi.

skills.name: Sensor Awareness
skills.description: Shee (S) uses Sensor Awareness and deals 20 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn if a new enemy skill is used on Shee he will be invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ally Heal
skills.description: Using Ally Heal Shee (S) heals 1 ally for 20 health.

skills.name: Lightning Illusion Flash
skills.description: Shee (S) uses Lighting Illusion Flash on 1 enemy dealing 35 damage. That enemy will be invulnerable to new friendly skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Defensive Reaction
skills.description: This skill makes Shee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Dodai (S)
description: Dodai (S) is a skilled sensor shinobi and a lava release user as well. His intelligence is his most powerful asset and he will need it to survive this war.

skills.name: Rubber Wall
skills.description: Dodai (S) uses Rubber Wall on all allies. Damage dealt to Dodai (S) and his team will be reduced by 10 for 3 turns. All targets of this skill will ignore stun effects during this skill.

skills.name: Communication Telepathy
skills.description: Using Communication Telepathy Dodai (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. That enemy will be unable to use stun effects(This is a stun effect).

skills.name: Rubber Ball and Rope
skills.description: Dodai (S) uses Rubber Ball and Rope one enemy dealing 35 damage. One random teammate will be invulnerable when this skill is used. The following 4 turns Communication Telepathy will stun the target of this skill.

skills.name: Lava Release Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Dodai (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Sennin Jiraiya (S)
description: Sennin Jiraiya (S) uses sage chakra to improve his speed, strength, and skills. The only downfall is that it alters his appearance similar to that of a toad and makes him unappealing to women, which makes it a last resort for the pervy sage. Original Design: Ider

skills.name: Bath of Burning Oil
skills.description: Using a mixture of wind, oil, and fire, Sennin Jiraiya (S) deals 20 damage and 15 piercing damage to one enemy. For 1 turn counter skills used by that enemy will last 1 turn less.

skills.name: Kebari Senbon
skills.description: Sennin Jiraiya (S) turns his hair into needles and deals 15 damage to all enemies. Sennin Jiraiya (S) will be invulnerable to chakra skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chou Oodama Rasengan
skills.description: Creating a massive rasengan, Sennin Jiraiya (S) deals 45 damage to 1 enemy. For 1 turn that enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable.

skills.name: Arm Block
skills.description: This skill makes Sennin Jiraiya (S) invunerable for 1 turn.

name: Hozuki Suigetsu (S)
description: Hozuki Suigetsu (S) is a native of Kirigakure who was once a captive of Orochimaru. He is a dangerous individual with unique abilities and now follows Uchiha Sasuke.

skills.name: Muscle Expansion
skills.description: Suigetsu (S) expands his muscles with water and attacks with his sword. He deals 20 damage to one enemy and gains 10 destructible defense for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hydro Taijutsu
skills.description: Suigetsu (S) uses water to launch an extreme taijutsu attack. Suigetsu (S) deals 40 piercing damage to one enemy and he gains 10 damage reduction for 1 turn.

skills.name: Rehydration
skills.description: Suigetsu (S) replenishes his body with water. For 2 turns he is invulnerable to enemy mental skills, gains 1 random chakra, and 10 permanent destructible defense each turn.

skills.name: Zanbato Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Suigetsu (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Karin (S)
description: Karin (S) is a former subordinate of Orochimaru who oversaw one of his secret laboratories. She is a skilled sensor and master of chakra control who now follows Uchiha Sasuke.

skills.name: Minds Eye of Kagura
skills.description: Karin (S) uses her chakra detection skills to predict her enemy's action. For 1 turn, if one enemy uses an offensive skill it will be countered; if that enemy uses a friendly skill, their skill costs will increase by 1 random chakra for 2 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Raging Punch
skills.description: Karin (S) deals 30 damage to 1 enemy. For 1 turn that enemy will be unable to use stun skills (this is a stun effect). This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Chakra Transfer
skills.description: Karin (S) allows 1 ally to bite her, transferring her chakra to them. That ally will be healed for 30 health and Karin (S) will take 5 affliction damage*.

skills.name: Precipitous Retreat
skills.description: This skill makes Karin (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Cursed Seal Juugo (S)
description: Cursed Seal Juugo (S) is fully transformed and no longer recognizable. Becoming a psychotic lunatic Juugo is able to maintain absurd amounts of chakra making him nearly impossible to defeat.

skills.name: Psychotic Break
skills.description: Cursed Seal Juugo (S) is out of his mind and targets 1 enemy. For 3 turns that enemy will be dealt 10 damage and Juugo will gain 5 damage reduction during this skill.

skills.name: Chakra Cannons
skills.description: Cursed Seal Juugo (S) targets 1 enemy and deals 50 damage.

skills.name: Body Absorption
skills.description: Using Body Absorption Juugo Steals 15 health from 1 enemy.

skills.name: Resilience
skills.description: This skill makes Cursed Seal Juugo (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Mangekyou Sasuke (S)
description: Mangekyou Sasuke (S), Sasuke after defeating his older brother Itachi has gained the mangekyou sharingan. That combined with his embrace of darkness makes him one of the deadliest shinobi alive.

skills.name: Amateur Susanoo
skills.description: Mangekyou Sasuke (S) uses Amateur Susanoo. Sasuke gains 20 destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Enton Amaterasu
skills.description: Mangekyou Sasuke (S) uses Enton Amaterasu. The following 3 turns if a new non mental skill is used on Sasuke that enemy will be dealt 5 affliction affliction permanently and will receive 5 affliction permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Dark Genjutsu
skills.description: Mangekyou Sasuke (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy. That enemy's skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Hawk Summoning
skills.description: This skill makes Mangekyou Sasuke (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Yakushi Kabuto (S)
description: Kabuto (S) is the loyal servant of Orochimaru and is a very dangerous missing-nin. He is a calculating individual who is both accomplished at combat and healing. Original Design: Oreacharound

skills.name: Charging Mystical Palm
skills.description: Kabuto (S) strikes an enemy dealiing 20 damage to them. For 1 turn that enemy cannot use skills with healing effects (this is a stun effect).

skills.name: Dead Soul Jutsu
skills.description: Kabuto (S) summons a dead soul to attack one enemy dealing 35 piercing damage to them. For 2 turns that enemy will ignore healing effects.

skills.name: Medical Ninjutsu
skills.description: Using advanced medical techniques, Kabuto (S) remove affliction skills and heals an ally or himself for 25 health.

skills.name: Precise Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Yakushi Kabuto (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Orochimaru (S)
description: Orochimaru(s) returns, strong as ever and with some new tricks up his sleeve. But his body seems to be on borrowed time.

skills.name: Second Skin
skills.description: Orochimaru (S) has learned a way to regenerate by shedding his skin like a snake. This skill can only be used when Orochimaru (S) has 30 health or less. When used, Orochimaru (S) will return to 70 health.

skills.name: Sword Snake Horde
skills.description: Orochimaru (S) regurgitates a horde of snakes who themselves produce swords from their mouths dealing 20 affliction damage to one enemy and stun effects used by that enemy the following turn will last 1 turn less.

skills.name: Extended Kusanagi
skills.description: Orochimaru (S) extends the length of his famed sword Kusanagi to pin down and harm one enemy. That enemy has their physical and chakra skills stunned for 2 turns. During this time this enemy takes 20 piercing damage each turn.

skills.name: Triple Rashoumon
skills.description: This skill makes Orochimaru (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Fukasaku and Shima (S)
description: Fukasaku and Shima (S) are known as the two great sage toads of Mount Myoboku. They taught both Jiraiya and Naruto sage jutsu and are each skilled in elemental techniques as well as genjutsu techniques.

skills.name: Frog Song
skills.description: Fukasaku and Shima (S) use their pattened genjustu to use Frog Song. They target 1 enemy and deal 15 affliction damage for 2 turns.

skills.name: Sand Dust
skills.description: Fukasaku and Shima (S) use Sand Dust. All allies will be invulnerable to physical and affliction skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Toad Confrontation Singing
skills.description: Fukasaku and Shima (S) use Toad Confrontation Singing on all enemies dealing 15 damage for 2 turns. If any enemy uses a new skill during Toad Confrontation Singing they will have their Chakra and Mental skills stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Reverse Summoning
skills.description: This skill makes Fukasaku and Shima (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Akatsuki Orochimaru
description: After he escaped the Hidden Leaf, Orochimaru became affiliated with and joined the elite criminal organisation Akatsuki. Orochimaru was then partnered with Sasori, with whom he did much good for the organisation. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Denni

skills.name: Wind Release: Great Breakthrough
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru destroys all of one enemy's destructible defense and then deals 20 piercing damage to them.

skills.name: Hidden Snake
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks. This skill becomes 'Binding Snake Glare Spell' for 1 turn after used.

skills.name: Murderous Taunt
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru gains 5 points of damage reduction and targets all enemies permanently. Everytime an enemy uses: a new non-mental skill, Akatsuki Orochimaru will gain 5 points of damage reduction for 1 turn; a new mental skill, Akatsuki Orochimaru will ignore enemy stun effects for 1 turn. This skill becomes 'Damnation Seal' permanently after used, stacks and ends if Akatsuki Orochimaru dies.

skills.name: Snake Instinct
skills.description: This skill makes Akatsuki Orochimaru invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Binding Snake Glare Spell
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru targets one enemy affected by 'Hidden Snake', dealing 10 affliction damage to them. This enemy will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Damnation Seal
skills.description: Akatsuki Orochimaru stuns one enemy's physical and affliction skills for 2 turns.

name: Kisame Body Double (S)
description: By using one of Pein's techniques a Sand Nin spy for Akatsuki is changed to look like Kisame. The body double is controlled by Kisame but only has a third of his chakra.

skills.name: Explosive Water Shock Wave
skills.description: Kisame Body Double (S) fills the battlefield with water. For 4 turns, all allies including Kisame will lose one less chakra if a chakra removal or stealing skill is used on them. For 4 turns, all enemies who use a skill will have the cooldown of that skill increased by two turns.*

skills.name: Water Prison Technique
skills.description: Using a bubble of water, Kisame stuns the non-mental skills of one enemy for 1 turn. During this time the enemy takes 15 affliction damage and becomes invulnerable to friendly skills*, and Kisame gains 15 points of damage reduction. During Explosive Water Shock Wave this skill costs 1 random chakra.

skills.name: Five Man-Eating Sharks
skills.description: Kisame Body Double summons five sharks of water who attack one enemy dealing 25 damage for 2 turns. During Explosive Water Shock Wave this skill costs 1 ninjutsu chakra.

skills.name: Kisame Body Double (S) Water Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Kisame Body Double (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Itachi Body Double (S)
description: By using one of Pein's techniques a Sand Nin spy for Akatsuki is changed to look like Itachi. The body double is controlled by Itachi but only has a third of his chakra.

skills.name: Finger Genjutsu
skills.description: Itachi affects one enemy with Finger Genjutsu for 1 turn. If the affected enemy uses any skill on Itachi Body Double (S) or his allies that skill will be countered and that enemy will take 10 damage and Itachi Body Double (S) will gain 1 genjutsu chakra. The target of this skill is invisible.

skills.name: Genjutsu Reversal
skills.description: For 2 turns if any enemy uses a skill which is non-unique on Itachi Body Double (S), he will reflect that skill onto the enemy who used it. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Goukakyuu no Jutsu
skills.description: Itachi Body Double (S) creates a large fireball that scorches the battlefield. One enemy takes 20 affliction damage. The following turn all enemies take an additional 10 affliction damage.*

skills.name: Illusionary Raven Bunshin
skills.description: This skill makes Itachi Body Double (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Deidara (S)
description: A former ninja of the Earth Village and now a junior Akatsuki member, Deidara is able to fuse clay and chakra to create devastating explosives.

skills.name: C3: Spider
skills.description: Deidara gains 10 points of damage reduction and deals 15 piercing damage to one enemy. If that enemy use a new harmful skill they have 'Katsu' applied on them.

skills.name: C1: Explosives
skills.description: Deidara (S) deals 15 affliction damage to all enemies. If any enemy uses a new harmful skill they have 'C1: Explosion' applied on them. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

skills.name: Clay Mode
skills.description: For 2 Turns Deidara gains 10 damage reduction. Deidara permanently will deals 5 additional damage and this effect stacks. For 2 turns this skill becomes 'Art is a Bang'.

skills.name: Deidara Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Deidara (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Katsu!
skills.description: Deidara deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy and 'C1: Explosives' permanentlyc deals 5 additional damage.

skills.name: C1: Explosion
skills.description: Deidara deals 10 affliction damage and 'Art is a Bang' permanently deals 5 additional damage.

skills.name: Art is a Bang
skills.description: Deidara dies and deals 20 affliction damage to all enemies and stun they non-mental skills for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered or reflected and ignores invunerability. The self death cannot be ignored.

name: Hiruko Sasori (S)
description: Hiruko is a puppet used by the Akatsuki shinobi, Sasori. Serving as a 'puppet armor', it allowed Sasori to hide inside of it. Hiruko is a human puppet made from the corpse of a renowned shinobi - this puppet is also Sasori's favorite.

skills.name: Poisonous Tail Stab
skills.description: Hiruko Sasori deals 10 affliction damage to one enemy, who will take 5 affliction damage each following turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Sand Clone Trap
skills.description: For 1 turn, Hiruko Sasori will ignore all enemy damage dealt. Every enemy that use a new non-mental skill on him during this time will take 10 affliction damage instantly and then take 10 affliction damage permanently. This skill stacks and ends when Hiruko Sasori dies. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Puppet Reveal
skills.description: Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy affliction skills on him then becomes invulnerable to Chakra and Affliction skills for 3 turns. During this time, 'Poisonous Tail Stab' will be replaced by 'Eight Waves of Needles' and 'Sand Clone Trap' will be replaced by 'Prosthetic Arm Senbon'.

skills.name: Tail Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Hiruko Sasori (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Eight Waves of Needles
skills.description: Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy affliction skills on his team and then deals 5 affliction damage to all enemies each turn permanently. This skill stacks.

skills.name: Prosthetic Arm Senbon
skills.description: Hiruko Sasori removes all enemy affliction skills on his team and then deals 5 piercing damage and 5 affliction damage* to all enemies for 3 turns. When this skill ends, Hiruko Sasori will become invulnerable for 1 turn. This skill ends if Hiruko Sasori dies.

name: Sasori (S)
description: Sasori (S) is a senior Akatsuki member and a legendary puppet master. He is even rumored to have defeated an entire nation with puppets alone.

skills.name: Puppet Mastery
skills.description: Sasori (S) may use Needle Shot and Tail Strike and gains 10 destructible defense. At 75 health he may use Arm Trap and Iron Sand and gains 20 destructible defense. At 50 health he may use 100 Puppets and Fire-Water and gains 30 destructible defense. This skill is permanent.

skills.name: Needle Shot, Arm Trap, 100 Puppets
skills.description: 1) Needle Shot deals 5 affliction damage every turn. 2) Arm Trap deals 10 affliction damage for 3 turns to one enemy. 3) 100 Puppets deals 15 damage to all enemies.

skills.name: Tail Strike, Iron Sand, Fire-Water
skills.description: 1) Tail Strike deals 20 damage to one enemy. Additionally, they take 5 affliction damage every turn after.* 2) Iron Sand has the same effects as Tail Strike but targets all enemies. 3) Fire-Water deals 50 damage to one enemy.

skills.name: Core Shift
skills.description: This skill makes Sasori (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Puppet Sasori (S)
description: Sasori's true form is a puppet body with a living core attached to it. In this form, he can use weapons like a flamethrower and water jets, while still controling a hundred puppets. ORIGINAL DESIGN: AnteMito

skills.name: Flamethrower
skills.description: Puppet Sasori deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy. If 'Water Stream Shooters' was used on this enemy the previous turn, they will have their non-affliction damage reduced by 10 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Stream Shooters
skills.description: Puppet Sasori deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If 'Flamethrower' was used on this enemy the previous turn, they will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Performance of a Hundred Puppets
skills.description: For 3 turns, Puppet Sasori targets all enemies and everytime they use a new harmful skill, they will take 5 piercing damage. The following 3 turns, this skill will be replaced by 'Puppet Attack'. During this time 'Water Stream Shooters' and 'Flamethrower' will have their improved effects in any enemy instead of target previous enemy.

skills.name: Living Core
skills.description: This skill makes Puppet Sasori (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Puppet Attack
skills.description: Puppet Sasori deals 20 damage to all enemies.

name: Hidan (S)
description: Hidan is a member of Akatsuki and a worshiper of the obscure god Jashin. He is apparently immortal and has perhaps the foulest mouth of the entire criminal organization

skills.name: Reaping Scythe
skills.description: Hidan deals 10 piercing damage to one enemy. During 'Possessed Blood Ritual' this skill cannot be countered and deals 5 additional damage. This skill ignores invunerability.

skills.name: Possessed Blood Ritual
skills.description: Hidan targets one enemy and deals 10 affliction damage for 3 Turns. Each turn, Hidan will steal damage points from that enemy, making them deal 5 less non-Affliction damage for 3 turns and granting Hidan 5 additional non-Affliction damage for 3 turns. This skill stacks. During this time 'Reaping Scythe' is improved and 'Curse of Jashin' Cannot be used.

skills.name: Curse of Jashin
skills.description: Hidan target an enemy for 2 turns and deals 10 affliction damage that cannot be ignored. During this time, all new non-affliction skills used on Hidan will be redirected to that enemy, this skill becomes 'Impale' and 'Possessed Blood Ritual' cannot be used.

skills.name: Imortality
skills.description: This skill makes Hidan (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Impale
skills.description: Hidan targets himself and deals 20 piercing damage to an enemy that is affected by 'Curse of Jashin'. If that enemy dies after this skill is used, Hidan will gain 1 bloodline chakra and will heal himself 20 health. This skill ignores invulnerability.

name: Kakuzu (S)
description: A missing-nin of mysterious talents and a member of Akatsuki, Kakuzu(s) is certainly older than he appears. He seems to only be concerned with money and the bounties which provide him with it.

skills.name: Fuuton Atsugai
skills.description: Fuuton Atsugai deals 30 damage to one enemy and stuns their non-physical skills for 1 turn. This  skill becomes 'Katon Zukokku' for 1 turn.

skills.name: Raiton Gian
skills.description: Raiton Gian deals 30 piercing damage to one enemy and less 5 non-affliction damage. This skill becomes Inferno Gust for 1 turn.

skills.name: Heart Steal
skills.description: Using his tendrils Kakuzu rips the heart out of one enemy deals 20 damage to one enemy. If Kakuzu kills that enemy, their will heals 25 health.

skills.name: Iron Skin Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Kakuzu (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Katon Zukokku
skills.description: Katon Zukokku deals 10 affliction damage to all enemies. This skill becomes Fuuton Atsugai.

skills.name: Inferno Gust
skills.description: Inferno gust deal 25 damage to one enemy and 15 to all other enemies. This skill becomes Raiton Gian.

name: Uchiha Itachi (S)
description: Uchiha Itachi is a member of Akatsuki, and the brother of Uchiha Sasuke. He has mastered the sharingan completely.

skills.name: Improved Great Fire Ball Jutsu
skills.description: Itachi deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy and 10 affliction damage to others. The other enemies will have non-affliction damage reduced by 5 for 1 turn.

skills.name: Weakened Amaterasu
skills.description: Itachi deals 20 affliction damage to one enemy and permanently 5 affliction damage. This skill stacks and end when Itachi (S) dies.

skills.name: Mastered Mangekyou Sharigan
skills.description: For 1 turn, Itachi becomes invulnerable to non-mental skills for 1 turn and Itachi will gain 5 permamently damage reduction. This skill becomes Weakned Tsukuyomi and if a new non mental skill is used on him, that enemy will take 5 additional damage from Itachi skills permamently.

skills.name: Crow Dispersion
skills.description: This skill makes Uchiha Itachi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Weakened Tsukyomi
skills.description: Itachi target an enemy for 1 turn and they will take 15 damage next turn. If that enemy use a new skill their will take 10 additional damage from mental skills. This skill is invisible.

name: Susanoo Itachi (S)
description: After using Amaterasu and Tsukuyomi, Itachi awakened his triumph, Susanoo, and became even stronger, both defensively with his Yata Mirror and offensively with his Totsuka Sword capable of sealing an opponent.

skills.name: Susanoo Activation
skills.description: Uchiha Itachi activates Susanoo, and he takes 10 affliction damage. Each turn he gains 5 permanent stacking destructible defense and his skills become usable for the rest of the game and this skill cannot be removed. This skill permanently becomes 'World of Drunken Dreams'.

skills.name: Totsuka Sword
skills.description: Susanoo Itachi (S) uses the legendary blade of Susanoo to deal 20 piercing damage to 1 enemy and removes one random chakra from them. The following turn this skill won't remove any chakra. This skill requires Susanoo Activation.

skills.name: Yata Mirror
skills.description: Itachi targets himself for 1 turn. This turn any new enemy non-mental skill that targets Susanoo Itachi (S) that will instantly be reflected back upon the enemy who used it. This skill is invisible and requieres 'Susanoo Activation'.

skills.name: Susanoo Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Susanoo Itachi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: World of Drunken Dreams
skills.description: Itachi target an Enemy for 1 turn and deals 20 affliction damage and reduce their non affliction damage by 10 points.

name: Hoshigaki Kisame (S)
description: Hoshigake Kisame (S) is the partner of Uchiha Itachi in Akatsuki. He is an expert swordsman and missing nin from the Hidden Mist Village.

skills.name: Samehada Fusion
skills.description: Hoshigake Kisame (S) uses Samehada Fusion gaining 10 permanently destructible defense. For 2 turns, Kisame (S) will gain 2 additional random chakra if he has a chakra steal/removal skill used on him. During this time this skill becomes Shark Bomb: Explosion.

skills.name: Samehada Frenzy
skills.description: Using Samehada Frenzy Kisame (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and removes 1 random chakra from them.

skills.name: Shark Bomb
skills.description: Kisame (S) uses Shark Bomb on one enemy dealing 30 piercing damage and stuns their Physical and Affliction skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Water Isolation
skills.description: This skill makes Hoshigaki Kisame (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Shark Bomb: Explosion
skills.description: Kisame (S) deals 15 piercing damage to all enemies and stuns their removal/steal chakra skills.

name: Animal Path Pein (S)
description: Animal Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. This Path is able to summon a variety of different beasts for different purposes.

skills.name: Cerberus Hydra
skills.description: Animal Path Pein summons a giant multiple headed dog that deals 30 damage to one enemy. The following 2 turns any enemy that uses a skill will be dealt 15 piercing damage.

skills.name: Drill Bird
skills.description: Animal Path Pein summons a giant drill-beaked bird to assault one enemy, dealing 15 damage to them for 3 turns.

skills.name: Invisible Chameleon
skills.description: Animal Path Pein summons a chameleon that is able to become invisible to hide himself or any Ally. For 4 turns Animal Path Pein or any ally will ignore enemy stun effects and gains 15 points of damage reduction.

skills.name: Panda Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Animal Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Female Animal Path Pein (S)
description: During his fight against Jiraiya, Nagato lost the Animal Path of Pain. He needed another body to recreate it and found it on a girl from the Hidden Rain Village named Ajisai

skills.name: Summoning: Ox
skills.description: Female Animal Path Pain deals 15 damage to all enemies for 2 turns. During this time, Female Animal Path Pain will gain 15 points of damage reduction* and 'Summoning: Rhino' will cost 1 random energy instead*.

skills.name: Summoning: Rhino
skills.description: Female Animal Path Pain deals 20 damage to an enemy. This enemy cannot reduce damage or become invulnerable for 1 turn. For 1 turn, 'Summoning: Ox' will deal 10 additional damage to this enemy.

skills.name: Summoning: Centipede Protection
skills.description: Female Animal Path Pain makes one ally invulnerable from Physical and Chakra skills for 1 turn. For 1 turn, Female Animal Path Pain will gain 10 points of damage reduction and ignore enemy stun effects.

skills.name: Animal Mouth Hiding
skills.description: This skill makes Female Animal Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Asura Path Pein (S)
description: Asura Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. His body style is similar to a puppet filled with hidden weapons.

skills.name: Chakra Burst
skills.description: Asura uses Chakra Burst on one enemy making them unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable and dealing 20 damage to them for 1 turn. Damage dealt to Asura will be reduced by 5 for 2 turns and any enemy that uses a new skill on Asura will take 10 damage. This skill Becomes 'Crown Shockwave' when used.

skills.name: Cluster Bombs
skills.description: Asura Path Pein (S) uses Cluster Bombs on all enemies dealing 10 piercing damage. For 1 turn any enemy that uses a new harmful will be dealt 5 piercing damage.

skills.name: Heat Seeker
skills.description: Asura Path Pein (S) uses Heat Seeker on one enemy. That enemy will take 20 piercing damage when Asura path Pein (S) dies.This skill is invisible until triggered. This skill stacks.

skills.name: High Speed Reaction
skills.description: This skill makes Asura Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Crown Shockwave
skills.description: Asura Path Pein (S) deals 25 damage to all enemies. This skill becomes Chakra Burst after being used.

name: Human Path Pein (S)
description: Human Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. This path is a mind reader and gathers intel for the other paths.

skills.name: Mind Invasion
skills.description: Human Path Pein (S) uses Mind Invasion on one enemy. That enemy will be dealt 20 piercing damage and have their mental and physical skills stunned for 1 turn. Soul Steal may be used on the target the following turn.

skills.name: Soul Steal
skills.description: Human Path Pein (S) uses Soul Steal on an enemy effected by Mind Invasion. That enemy will take 35 piercing damage. If used on an enemy and that enemy drops to 10 or less health that enemy will be killed.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.description: Human Path Pein (S) launches a sneak attack dealing 30 piercing damage to one enemy. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Rinnegan Awareness
skills.description: This skill makes Human Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Preta Path Pein (S)
description: Preta Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. This path is able to nulify jutsus and is used mostly for defensive tactics.

skills.name: Energy Shield
skills.description: Preta Path (S) uses Energy Shield on one enemy removing 1 random chakra. That enemy will be dealt 20 piercing damage.

skills.name: Rinnegan Absorption
skills.description: Preta Path Pein (S) uses Rinnegan Absorption to protect himself. All damage dealt on Preta Path Pein (S) will be ignored and any enemy that uses a new damaging skill on him will lose chakra equal the chakra cost of the skill used (except Random Chakra).

skills.name: Chakra Pin
skills.description: Using Chakra Pin Preta Path Pein (S) stuns one enemy's offensive skills.  If that enemy uses a new skill, Preta (S) will steal 1 random chakra from them. If they don't use a skill, they will lose 1 random chakra

skills.name: Agile Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Preta Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Naraka Path Pein (S)
description: Naraka Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. This path is able to interrogate it's enemies at will. Naraka Path Pein (S) can also give life as well as take it.

skills.name: Outer Path
skills.description: Naraka Path Pein (S) summons the Outer Path gaining 5 damage reduction* and dealing 10 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. Judgement can be used during this skill.

skills.name: Judgement
skills.description: Naraka Path Pein (S) passes Judgement on one enemy when Outer Path is being used. Naraka Path Pein (S) will steal 20 health from that enemy and for 1 turn they will ignore healing effects.

skills.name: Rejuvenation
skills.description: Naraka Path Pein (S) uses Rejuvenation on himself or an ally. That character will be healed for 25 health.

skills.name: Chakra Rod Deflection
skills.description: This skill makes Naraka Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Deva Path Pein (S)
description: Deva Path Pain is one of the six paths of Pain. This path is able to use itself as the epicenter of magnetism to attract or repel all objects. This path holds the most power and is the main force in battle for Pain.

skills.name: Chakra Rod
skills.description: Deva Path Pein (S) deals 15 piercing damage. For 1 turn, that enemy's skills cost an additional random chakra. Permanently, that enemy will take 5 more damage from Deva's skills. This skill becomes Chibaku Tensei for 2 turn.

skills.name: Universal Pull
skills.description: Deva Path Pein (S) uses Universal Pull on one enemy for 1 turn. If that enemy uses a new harmful skill, that skill will be countered and that enemy will be dealt 20 damage and they will deal 10 less non-affliction damage for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Shinra Tensei
skills.description: Deva uses Shinra Tensei to deal 15 damage to one enemy and 10 to all other enemies. For 1 turn, Deva becomes invulnerable to all physical skills.

skills.name: Rinnegan Pressure
skills.description: This skill makes Deva Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chibaku Tensei
skills.description: Deva Path Pein deals 25 damage to all enemies. For 1 turn, all enemies will have their Physical and Chakra skills stunned. This skill cannot be countered or reflected.

name: Konan (S)
description: Konan (S) is a member of Akatsuki and a master of origami ninjutsu, earning her the title God's Angel in Amegakure. Able to turn her body into thick sheets of paper, she is capable of multiple forms of attack.

skills.name: Sword of Paper
skills.description: Using a sword made of paper, Konan (S) deals 25 piercing damage to 1 enemy.

skills.name: Origami Blanket
skills.description: Konan (S) covers one enemy in paper. For 2 turns that enemy has their non-mental skills stunned, will be invulnerable to all new friendly skills, and takes 15 damage each turn. During this time Sword of Paper will deal an additional 10 damage to that enemy.

skills.name: Dance Of The Shikigami
skills.description: Konan (S) uses Dance Of The Shikigami dealing 25 damage to one enemy and 25 to a random different enemy.

skills.name: Onmyoji Dodge
skills.description: This skill makes Konan (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Konan of the Rain (S)
description: Konan of the Rain (S) has returned to the Hidden Rain village. Now that Uzumaki Nagato is dead she is aligned with Uzumaki Naruto and his quest for peace.

skills.name: Paper Chakram
skills.description: Konan of the Rain (S) hurls a Paper Chakram at one enemy dealing 35 piercing damage. Konan of the Rain (S) will ignore stun effects for 1 turn when this skill is used.

skills.name: Paper Ocean
skills.description: Using Paper Ocean Konan of the Rain (S) and all allies gain 10 points of damage reduction for 2 turns. For 2 turns all enemies that use a new skill will have the cooldown of that skill increased by 1 turn.*

skills.name: Explosive Tags
skills.description: Konan of the Rain (S) uses Explosive Tags on one enemy dealing 20 damage. This skill becomes Paper Shurikens permanently when used.

skills.name: Paper God Technique
skills.description: This skill makes Konan of the Rain (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Paper Shurikens
skills.description: This skills deals 20 piercing damage to an enemy. 'Explosive Tags' deals 10 additional damage to the target of this ability permanently. This effect stacks. This skills becomes 'Explosive Tags' permanently when used.​

name: Nagato (S)
description: Nagato is the leader of Akatsuki and is also known as Pein. He is in control of the six paths of Pein and was a former student of Jiraiya. Nagato possess the rinnegan and may be the strongest ninja in the shinobi world.

skills.name: Demonic Statue Summoning
skills.description: Nagato (S) targets all enemies and uses Demonic Statue Summoning dealing 20 damage. Nagato (S) will gain 10 points of destructible defense for 1 turn when this skill is used. The following turn Etheral Dragon will deal an additional 10 damage any enemy effected by this skill.

skills.name: Etheral Dragon
skills.description: Using Etheral Dragon Nagato (S) deals 20 damage to one enemy. If Enemy health drops to 30 or less, they will be stunned. If Demonic Statue Summoning is active on the target of this skill it will deal an additional 10 damage.

skills.name: Samsara of Heavenly Life
skills.description: Nagato (S) uses Samsara of Heavenly to revive all dead allies to 40 health. After this, Nagato will die. This skill only can be used with 40 health or less.

skills.name: Bansho Block
skills.description: This skill makes Nagato (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: White Zetsu (S)
description: White Zetsu (S) is intent to follow Tobi's orders. With his abilities he will be trouble for anyone that comes across him.

skills.name: Spore Technique
skills.description: White Zetsu (S) uses Spore Technique on one teammate or himself. For 2 turns the target of this skill will gain 1 random chakra and ignore stun effects.

skills.name: Wood Release Roots
skills.description: White Zetsu (S) attacks from below using Wood Release Roots on one enemy dealing 30 piercing damage. That enemy's non-mental skills will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Parasite Clone
skills.description: White Zetsu (S) targets one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill Zetsu (S) will copy it for 4 turns. Unique skills and skills requiring a preparation cannot be copied. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Zetsu Substitute
skills.description: This skill makes White Zetsu (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Black Zetsu (S)
