description: Black Zetsu is the physical manifestation of Ootsutsuki Kaguya's will. To further its plans, it posed as Uchiha Madara's manifested will and then partnered with White Zetsu to become the Akatsuki member known simply as Zetsu.

skills.name: Body Coating
skills.description: Black Zetsu targets one enemy until Black Zetsu himself dies. Everytime that enemy uses a new skill, they will have their non-mental skills stunned for 1 turn and the skill they used will replace 'Body Coating' for 1 turn. This skill cannot be reflected.

skills.name: Wood Release: Emerging Forest
skills.description: Black Zetsu deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Event Recording
skills.description: Black Zetsu targets himself and his allies. For 1 turn, they will have 10 points of damage reduction and will ignore all harmful effects except damage and energy cost changes. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Mayfly
skills.description: This skill makes Black Zetsu (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Tobi (S)
description: Not much is known about Tobi (S) other than he appears to be a member of the Uchiha clan.

skills.name: Tobi Sharingan
skills.description: Tobi (S) uses Tobi Sharingan gaining 5 damage reduction permanently. This effect stacks. Kamui will deal an additional 20 damage for 1 turn when this skill is used. This skill can only be used 3 times.

skills.name: Kamui
skills.description: Using Kamui Tobi (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill the following turn Kamui will deal an additional 10 damage to that enemy for 1 turn. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Hidden Izanagi
skills.description: Tobi (S) uses Hidden Izanagi. For 1 turn Tobi (S) will be invulnerable to enemy mental skills and Kamui will deal an additional 20 damage. Any enemy that uses a new skill on Tobi (S) will be dealt 5 piercing damage. This effect stacks*.

skills.name: Uchiha Perception
skills.description: This skill makes Tobi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Haku (S)
description: Edo Tensei Haku (S) is not sure why he is among the living again but his dream of protecting Zabuza pushes him to go all out.

skills.name: Crystal Ice Mirror
skills.description: Using Crystal Ice Mirror Edo Tensei Haku (S) deals 20 piercing damage to one enemy. Edo Tensei Haku (S) gains 5 permanently destructible defense when this skill is used.

skills.name: Sacrificial Detainment
skills.description: Edo Tensei Haku (S) uses Sacrificial Detainment on himself or any Ally. The following turn Edo Tensei Haku (S) gains 10 points of damage reduction and the first enemy that uses a skill on him will have their non mental skills stunned for 1 turns. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Silent Acupuncture
skills.description: Edo Tensei Haku (S) uses Silent Acupuncture on one enemy dealing 30 damage. This skill ignores invulnerability.

skills.name: Ice Style Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Haku (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Zabuza (S)
description: Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) has been summoned from the dead against his will. His unique abilities will surely be put to use on the battlefield.

skills.name: Demon Shroud
skills.description: Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) uses Demon Shroud. For 4 turns damage dealt to Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) will be reduced by 10 and he will be immune to enemy affliction damage. Executioner Strike will deal an additional 10 damage during this skill.

skills.name: Executioner Blade Absorption
skills.description: Using Executioner Blade Absorption Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) steals 10 health and removes 1 random chakra from one enemy.

skills.name: Executioner Strike
skills.description: Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) uses Executioner Strike on one enemy dealing 30 piercing damage.

skills.name: Demon Insight
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Zabuza (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Jinin (S)
description: Edo Tensei Jinin (S) is a former member of the seven swordsman of the mist. Using his sword Kabutowari he will demonstrate the power of the previous generation on the battlefield.

skills.name: Silent Axe Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinin (S) targets one enemy dealing 15 piercing damage. The following turn the target of this skill will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable or use counter skills(this is a stun effect). Kabutowari Wedge will be improved for 1 turn when this skill is used.

skills.name: Kabutowari Wedge
skills.description: Using Kabutowari Wedge Edo Tensei Jinin (S) deals 25 damage to one enemy. If Silent Axe Slash was effecting the target of this skill they will be unable to reduce damage or go invulnerable for 4 turns.

skills.name: Kabutowari
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinin (S) uses Kabutowari on one enemy dealing 30 damage. That enemy's skills will be stunned for 1 turn. This skill cannot be countered.

skills.name: Skilled Evasion
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Jinin (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Ameyuri (S)
description: Edo Tensei Ameyuri (S) has been summoned from the dead to participate in the fourth ninja war. She wields the dual sharpest swords ever made.

skills.name: Lightning Rain
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ameyuri (S) targets one enemy dealing 30 piercing damage. Edo Tensei Ameyuri (S)'s team will ignore damage from enemy skills for 1 turn. This effect is invisible.

skills.name: Twin Swords Ally Protection
skills.description: Ameyuri uses Twin Swords Ally Protection on herself and all allies for 1 turn. They gain 5 points of damage reduction. Any enemy that uses a skill on them takes 5 damage and 5 more from physical and chakra skills for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Silent Massacre
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ameyuri (S) uses Silent Massacre dealing 20 piercing damage to one enemy. Edo Tensei Ameyuri (S)'s team will ignore stun effects for 1 turn when this skill is used.This effect is invisible.

skills.name: Twin Kiba Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Ameyuri (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S)
description: Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) was a member of the Seven Swordsmen of the Mist and a member of the Hidden Mist Village's Anbu. During his life he committed countless atrocities and he is happy to be back from death to engage his newfound opponents.

skills.name: Silent Stiching
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) uses Silent Stitching on one enemy dealing 20 piercing damage.

skills.name: Spider Sewing
skills.description: Using Spider Sewing Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) targets all enemies. Silent Stitching and Wire Crucifixion will deal 5 more damage to all targets of this skill permanently. Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) gains 5 damage reduction for 1 turn when this skill is used. This skill ignores invulnerability and stacks.

skills.name: Wire Crucifixion
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) uses Wire Crucifixion on one enemy dealing 15 damage. That enemy's physical and chakra skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Senbon Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kuriarare (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S)
description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) is one of the previous Seven Swordsmen of the Mist and a particularly cruel individual.

skills.name: Explosive Tag Scroll
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) uses Explosive Tag Scroll and gains 5 destructible defense permanently. Silent Explosion will deal 20 additional damage in next use. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Silent Explosion
skills.description: Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) uses Silent Explosion on one enemy dealing 20 piercing damage. After use, this skill remove all additional damage stack of Jinpachi.

skills.name: Shibuki
skills.description: Jinpachi uses Shibuki on himself or one of his allies. The target will gain 15 destructible defense for 1 turn. Any enemy who uses a new skill on them will take 5 piercing damage permanently. This effect stacks. This skill is invisible

skills.name: Shibuki Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Jinpachi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Fuguki (S)
description: Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) is back from the dead and on a rampage. It does not concern him who he attacks or who is controlling him.

skills.name: Needle Senbon
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) quickly uses Needle Senbon on one enemy dealing 20 damage. This skill will deal an additional 5 damage when it is used. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Hardened Spikes
skills.description: Using Hardened Spikes Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) deals 15 damage to all enemies and stuns their harmful skills for 1 turn.

skills.name: Ranged Suppression
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) uses Ranged Suppression to force one enemy back and deal 15 damage for 2 turns. All skills that enemy uses during this skill will have 1 turn of additional cooldown. This skill cannot be used on a character already affected by it.

skills.name: Hair Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Fuguki (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Mangetsu (S)
description: Mangetsu was a member of the Hidden Mist's Hozuki clan and was reputed as Second Coming of the Demon. He was a member of the previous Seven Swordsmen of the Mist and was the only one able to wield all the seven swords. Mangetsu is Suigetsu's older brother

skills.name: Mist Sword Summoning
skills.description: Edo Tensei Mangetsu targets himself and gains 20 destructible defense for 3 turns. 'Hydrification Technique' will deals 5 additional damage and 'Impure World Regeneration' will last 1 additional turn.

skills.name: Hydrification Technique
skills.description: Edo Tensei Mangetsu steals 20 health from one enemy. For 1 turn, if this enemy uses a new harmful skill, Edo Tensei Mangetsu will gain 1 random chakra.

skills.name: Impure World Regeneration
skills.description: For 2 turns, Edo Tensei Mangetsu will be healed for 15 health each turn and will be unable to be killed. During this time 'Mist Sword Summoning' will cost 1 less random energy.

skills.name: Battle Stance
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Mangetsu (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Chiyo (S)
description: Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) has been summoned back from the afterlife. She may not like it but she will do her best to help her opponents out with information while she is forced to fight.

skills.name: White Secret Technique Ten Puppets
skills.description: Using White Secret Technique Ten Puppets Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) targets one enemy stunning their physical skills for 1 turn. One random enemy will be dealt 20 damage for 2 turns.

skills.name: Possum
skills.description: Edo Tensei Chiyo plays Possum on one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill on Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) or her allies it will be countered and they will be dealt 20 damage and their skills will be stunned for 1 turn. The Target of this skill is invisible.

skills.name: White Secret Art Illusion
skills.description: Using White Secret Art Illusion Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) targets one enemy dealing 20 damage. Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) will ignore non-ranged enemy skills for 1 turn when this skill is used.

skills.name: Puppet Master Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Chiyo (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Hizashi (S)
description: Hizashi is a member of a Hyuuga Clan's branch house, Hiashi's twin brother and Neji's father. At some point in Hizashi's life, he was branded with the clan's curse seal that would ensure his lifelong service to the main branch and that would seal his Byakugan when he died. He was reincarnated by Yakushi Kabuto during the Fourth Shinobi World War. ORIGINAL DESIGN: Takamaru

skills.name: Cursed Byakugan Activation
skills.description: For 4 turns, Edo Tensei Hizashi will lose 1 less chakra if a new energy removal or stealing skill is used on him, he will gain 5 points of damage reduction and his skills will do their alternate effects.

skills.name: Gentle Fist: Air Palm
skills.description: Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 30 damage to one enemy and removes 1 random energy from them. Alternate: Edo Tensei Hizashi deals 30 damage to one enemy, removes 1 random energy from them, and stuns them for 1 turn.

skills.name: Eight-Trigrams Revolving Heaven
skills.description: This skill can be used on Edo Tensei Hizashi or on an enemy. If used on Edo Tensei Hizashi, he will gain 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn and will counter all harmful skills used on him for 1 turn. If used on an enemy, they will take 15 damage and Edo Tensei Hizashi will gain 20 points of destructible defense for 1 turn. This skill is invisible. Alternate: This skill's effects are all applied regardless of its target. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Gentle Fist Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Hizashi invulnerable for 1 turn. Alternate: This skill can be used on Edo Tensei Hizashi or an enemy. If used on Edo Tensei Hizashi, he will become invulnerable for 1 turn. If used on an enemy, their damage will be reduced by 20 for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

name: Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S)
description: Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) is the other half of the legendary gold and silver brothers of the Hidden Cloud Village. They were the most notorious criminals in the history of the Hidden Cloud.

skills.name: Bashosen
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) uses Bashosen on one enemy dealing 25 affliction damage*. Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) will gain 10 damage reduction for 1 turn when this skill is used. Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) 'Benihisago', 'Silence is Golden' and 'Shichiseiken Slash' will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. 'Bashousen Flames' will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Kokinjo
skills.description: Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) uses Kokinjo on one enemy. If that enemy uses a new skill on Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) or his allies the following turn that skill will be countered and that enemy will be dealt 35 damage and Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) 'Benihisago', 'Silence is Golden' and 'Shichiseiken Slash' will deal an additional 10 damage to that enemy permanently. 'Bashosen' and 'Bashosen Flames' will deal an additional 10 damage to that enemy permanently. This skill is invisible and This effect stacks.

skills.name: Bashosen Flames
skills.description: Using Bashosen Flames Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) deals 20 damage to all enemies. Edo Ginkaku (S) 'Benihisago', 'Silence is Golden' and 'Shichiseiken Slash' will deal an additional 5 damage to all targets of this skill permanently. 'Bashousen' will deal an additional 5 damage to all targets of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Kokinjo Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S)
description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) is one half of the legendary gold and silver brothers of the Hidden Cloud Village. They were the most notorious criminals in the history of the Hidden Cloud.

skills.name: Shichiseiken Slash
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) uses Shichiseiken Slash on one enemy dealing 25 piercing damage. Damage Benihisago deals to that enemy will be increased by 5 permanently. Edo Tensei Kinkaku 'Bashosen' and 'Bashosen Flames' Damage deals to that enemy will be increased by 5 permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Silence is Golden
skills.description: Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) targets one enemy. For 1 turn, Ginkaku will deal 10 damage and stun their non-chakra skills.

skills.name: Benihisago
skills.description: Using Benihisago Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) deals 15 affliction damage to one enemy. Benihisago and Edo Tensei Kinkaku (S) Bashosen Flames and 'Kokinjo' will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently.

skills.name: Shichiseiken Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Ginkaku (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Nagato (S)
description: Edo Tensei Nagato (S) has been summoned to do battle. He is fully aware of the fact that he is being controlled again as he was while he was living.

skills.name: Human Path
skills.description: Edo Tensei Nagato (S) uses Human Path on one enemy dealing 30 damage. That enemy's offensive skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Preta Path
skills.description: Using Preta Path Edo Tensei Nagato (S) targets one enemy and steals 15 health points and removes 1 random chakra

skills.name: Animal Path
skills.description: Edo Tensei Nagato (S) uses Animal Path on all enemies dealing 10 damage for 2 turns. During this skill all enemies that use a skill on Edo Tensei Nagato (S) will be dealt 10 damage.

skills.name: Asura Path Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Nagato (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Deidara (S)
description: Edo Tensei Deidara (S) has been revived and is immediately sent out to battle. Fighting on the front lines is nothing new to this old soul.

skills.name: Katsu
skills.description: Using Katsu, Edo Tensei Deidara (S) targets one enemy dealing 20 piercing damage. Deidara will be invulnerable to enemy mental skills for 1 turn when this skill is used.

skills.name: Chakra Clay Trap
skills.description: Edo Tensei Deidara (S) uses Chakra Clay Trap on one enemy. If that enemy uses any skill on Edo Tensei Deidara (S) or his allies that skill will be countered and that enemy will take 20 piercing damage and Katsu will deal 5 additional damage to that enemy permanently.The target of this skill is invisible.

skills.name: Sonar Bat Bombs
skills.description: Edo Tensei Deidara (S) uses Sonar Bat Bombs on all enemies dealing 10 Affliction damage. All enemies this skill damages will take an additional 5 damage from Katsu permanently this effect stacks. This skill becomes Jellyfish Explosives when used.

skills.name: Flying Clay Clone
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Deidara (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Jellyfish Explosives
skills.description: Deals 25 piercing damage to 1 enemy. That enemy will take 10 additional damage, permanently, from Katsu. This skill becomes Sonar Bat Bombs when used.

name: Edo Tensei Sasori (S)
description: Edo Tensei Sasori (S) has been resurrected in the ageless body that he had always wanted during his life. He is sent out to the battlefield in Akatsuki's ambush squad.

skills.name: Chakra Threads
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sasori (S) uses Chakra Threads. For 3 turns damage to Edo Tensei Sasori (S) will be reduced by 10 points and Puppet Manipulation will deal an additional 5 damage.

skills.name: Ally Control
skills.description: Edo Tensei Sasori (S) uses Ally Control on one ally. For 1 turn all enemy skills used on that character will be reflected to the user of that skill. This skill is invisible.

skills.name: Puppet Manipulation
skills.description: Using Puppet Manipulation Edo Tensei Sasori (S) deals 15 damage to one enemy. For 1 turn non affliction damage that enemy deals will be reduced by 5. If the health of the target of this skill drops to 35 or below after this skill is used on them their physical and chakra skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Falling Guard
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Sasori (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Fukai (S)
description: Edo Tensei Fukai (S) has been summoned using the edo tensei jutsu. He is powerless to stop himself from rampaging.

skills.name: Chakra Arms
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fukai (S) uses Chakra Arms on all enemies dealing 10 affliction damage. Continuous Tailed Beast Bomb and Jinchuuriki Telepathy will deal 5 more damage to all targets of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Continuous Tailed Beast Bomb
skills.description: Using Continuous Tailed Beast Bomb Edo Tensei Fukai (S) deals 30 damage to one enemy. Edo Tensei Fukai (S) gains 5 damage reduction permanently when this skill is used. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Jinchuuriki Telepathy
skills.description: Edo Tensei Fukai (S) uses Jinchuuriki Telepathy on one enemy dealing 15 piercing damage. That enemy's harmful skills will be stunned for 1 turn.

skills.name: Chakra Cloak Defense
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Fukai (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

name: Edo Tensei Toroi (S)
description: Edo Tensei Toroi (S) is back on the battlefield wreaking havoc as he goes. It will be a difficult situation for whoever may come across him.

skills.name: Magnetic Field
skills.description: Edo Tensei Toroi (S) uses Magnetic Field on one enemy dealing 20 damage. If an enemy uses a skill on Edo Tensei Toroi (S) the following 2 turns they will ignore healing effects permanently. Magnetized Shuriken and Magnetic Current will deal an additional 5 damage to the target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Shurikenjutsu
skills.description: Using Shurikenjutsu Edo Tensei Toroi (S) gains 10 damage reduction for 3 turns. This skill becomes Magnetized Shuriken for 3 turns when used.

skills.name: Magnetic Current
skills.description: Edo Tensei Toroi (S) uses Magnetic Current on all enemies dealing 10 piercing damage. Magnetic Field and Magnetized Shuriken will deal an additional 5 damage to a target of this skill permanently. This effect stacks.

skills.name: Shuriken Threads
skills.description: This skill makes Edo Tensei Toroi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.

skills.name: Magnetized Shuriken
skills.description: This skill deals 10 piercing damage to an enemy. 'Magnetic Field' and 'Magnetic Current' will deal 5 more damage to that enemy permanently. This effect is cumulative.
